T04TD3944E:217b-1: p'a ra mi t'a sa m'a sa n'a ma /
T04TD3944E:217b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T04TD3944E:217b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04TD3944E:217b-5: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de //
T04TD3944E:217b-6: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song bas /
T04TD3944E:217b-7: ston pa gzhan la phyogs pa yi //
T04TD3944E:217b-8: ser sna'i dogs pa yongs su spang //
T04TD3944E:217b-9: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas sku //
T04TD3944E:217b-10: dpal ldan skyes chen mtshan 'chang la //
T04TD3944E:217b-11: ci nas shigs par mi nus pa //
T04TD3944E:217b-12: thob rtsol sangs rgyas skyabs song yin //
T04TD3944E:217b-13: 'jig rten skyabs med skyob pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:217b-14: spyod cing rang gi don btang ste //
T04TD3944E:217b-15: sangs rgyas bsgrub phyir blo brtan na //
T04TD3944E:217b-16: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:217b-17: rga shi nad dang 'chi ba las //
T04TD3944E:217b-18: sems can mgon med bskyab pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:217b-19: sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub smon na //
T04TD3944E:217b-20: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:217b-21: mthong thos dran dang reg pa dang //
T04TD3944E:217b-22: dri tshor ro myad cis kyang rung //
T04TD3944E:217b-23: 'gro ba kun la bde smon na //
T04TD3944E:217b-24: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:217b-25: sems can rnams la snying brtse zhing //
T04TD3944E:217b-26: bde gshegs yon tan thob mos na //
T04TD3944E:217b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la //
T04TD3944E:217b-28: mdor bsdus skyabs su song ba yin ;
T04TD3944E:217b-29: / byang chub mchog tu smon byed de //
T04TD3944E:217b-30: rang gi don la mi lta zhing //
T04TD3944E:217b-31: gzhan don brtson yang nga med na //
T04TD3944E:217b-32: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:217b-33: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod chen la //
T04TD3944E:217b-34: gang zhig skyo med zhum med cing //
T04TD3944E:217b-35: mos pa chen po skyed byed pa //
T04TD3944E:217b-36: de ni sangs rgyas skyabs song yin //
T04TD3944E:217b-37: skyabs kyi mchog ni stobs bcu dang //
T04TD3944E:217b-38: stobs bcu'i chos zhes de tshol zhing //
T04TD3944E:217b-39: yon tan tshogs la dad skyed na //
T04TD3944E:217b-40: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:217b-42: skyabs su bya zhes dam brtan na //
T04TD3944E:217b-43: de ni 'gro ba'i skyabs yin te //
T04TD3944E:217b-44: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:217b-45: nyon mongs bcas pa'i sems ldan pa'i //
T04TD3944E:217b-46: sems can gang tshe mthong gyur pa //
T04TD3944E:217b-47: de tshe mos pa che bskyed cing //
T04TD3944E:217b-48: gcig las rnam mang sprul byas te //
T04TD3944E:217b-49: 'jig rten dpag yas thams cad la //
T04TD3944E:217b-50: phan pa kun stobs lus dang sems //
T04TD3944E:218a-2: su sems sangs rgyas skyabs song yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-5: // / dam chos 'khor los sgyur ba yi //
T04TD3944E:218a-6: rgyal por gyur te 'chi med pa'i //
T04TD3944E:218a-7: lam gyis 'gro ba skyabs smon na //
T04TD3944E:218a-8: chos la skyabs su song ba yin ;
T04TD3944E:218a-9: / bdag kyang 'jig rten mtha' med kyang //
T04TD3944E:218a-10: snying rjes yongs su mi gtong zhing //
T04TD3944E:218a-11: dam chos bstan par gang mos pa //
T04TD3944E:218a-12: de ni chos la skyabs song yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-13: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:218a-14: bdag gis dam chos bstan bya zhes //
T04TD3944E:218a-15: sems can don la sems mnyen na //
T04TD3944E:218a-16: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-17: mang thos nan tan rgyan ldan dang //
T04TD3944E:218a-18: gzhan la bstan pa'i don bsgrub na //
T04TD3944E:218a-19: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-20: mtshan ma shin tu gsal ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-21: 'jig rten ma lus thams cad la //
T04TD3944E:218a-22: chos 'di skyabs kyi mchog yin zhes ;
T04TD3944E:218a-23: / rtog cing dam chos tshol byed na //
T04TD3944E:218a-24: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-25: chos kyi slob dpon bsnyen byed cing //
T04TD3944E:218a-26: nyan 'dod tshul bzhin yid byed la //
T04TD3944E:218a-27: ston cing nan tan lhur byed na //
T04TD3944E:218a-28: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-29: dam chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:218a-30: spyod pas yang dag spyod byed cing //
T04TD3944E:218a-31: lus dang srog la mi lta na //
T04TD3944E:218a-32: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-33: byang chub mchog gi phyogs kyi chos //
T04TD3944E:218a-34: bdag don ma yin gzhan don du //
T04TD3944E:218a-35: snying rje chen pos spyod byed na //
T04TD3944E:218a-36: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-37: gang zhig bde la chags med la //
T04TD3944E:218a-38: sdug bsngal rnam pas mi 'jigs shing //
T04TD3944E:218a-39: 'jig rten phan spyod chos shes na //
T04TD3944E:218a-40: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-41: dam chos tshul 'di ma thos pas //
T04TD3944E:218a-43: ston cing nan tan don byed na //
T04TD3944E:218a-44: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-45: 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyang //
T04TD3944E:218a-46: bdag gis chos la dgod bya zhes //
T04TD3944E:218a-47: sems bskyed nan tan spyod byed na //
T04TD3944E:218a-48: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218a-51: // / mos pa shin tu rnam dag pas //
T04TD3944E:218b-0: gang gis bsam pa mi bzlog @218b pa ;
T04TD3944E:218b-1: ; de ni dge 'dun skyabs su song yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-2: nges par lhung bar gyur pa yi //
T04TD3944E:218b-3: nyan thos theg la gnas pa rnams //
T04TD3944E:218b-4: byang chub sems ni skyed byed na //
T04TD3944E:218b-5: dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-6: dge 'dun yon tan dran byas shing //
T04TD3944E:218b-7: dge 'dun bzhin du bkur gnas su //
T04TD3944E:218b-8: 'jig rten thams cad bkur mos na //
T04TD3944E:218b-9: de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-10: byang chub go cha brtan byed cing //
T04TD3944E:218b-11: dge 'dun rnams la cher mos pas //
T04TD3944E:218b-12: dge 'dun bsnyen bkur gang dad pa //
T04TD3944E:218b-13: dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-14: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang //
T04TD3944E:218b-15: rnam grol de shes ston la sogs //
T04TD3944E:218b-16: dge 'dun yon tan rin chen gyis //
T04TD3944E:218b-17: 'jig rten brgyan par mos pa dang //
T04TD3944E:218b-18: dge 'dun dag la dad brtan pas //
T04TD3944E:218b-19: 'gro ba mang po kun gyis kyang //
T04TD3944E:218b-20: dad pas bzlog par mi nus na //
T04TD3944E:218b-21: de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-22: skyes bu dam pa rin po ches //
T04TD3944E:218b-23: bcas pa'i mu stegs gtsang ma ste /
T04TD3944E:218b-24: bdud la shin tu dpa' ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-25: skyes mchog de ni dge 'dun yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-26: yang dag ji bzhin smra byed cing //
T04TD3944E:218b-27: de la chung phul yongs 'gyur zhes //
T04TD3944E:218b-29: dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-30: byang chub mchog sems mi ldog dang //
T04TD3944E:218b-31: dbang dang tshang med yon tan gyis //
T04TD3944E:218b-32: brgyan pa'i yon tan gang tshol ba //
T04TD3944E:218b-33: de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-34: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ba //
T04TD3944E:218b-36: dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs ldan ni //
T04TD3944E:218b-37: de phyir mi 'jigs sbyin bdag yin //
T04TD3944E:218b-38: skyabs song bsod nams gzugs yod na //
T04TD3944E:218b-39: khams gsum 'di yang snod du chung //
T04TD3944E:218b-40: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu yi gter //
T04TD3944E:218b-41: phul gyis bcal bas gzhal mi nus //
T04TD3944E:218b-44: // / skyabs 'gro gsum byas phyin chad sbyin pa la //
T04TD3944E:218b-45: ci nas lus kyi yan lag bslangs gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:218b-46: tshul ngan gtong la zhum par mi 'gyur bar //
T04TD3944E:218b-47: 'jig rten phan par brtson pas skyor ba bya //
T04TD3944E:218b-48: ser sna'i skyon ni gang gis 'phel 'gyur ram //
T04TD3944E:218b-49: yongs su gtong sems 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba'i //
T04TD3944E:219a-0: yongs 'dzin bgegs su 'gyur ba'i slu ba @219a * //
T04TD3944E:219a-1: dag ; byang chub sems dpas ma lus yongs su spang //
T04TD3944E:219a-2: gang zhig gter sems gnyen por 'gyur ba dag / yang dag byang chub lam la sgrib byed na //
T04TD3944E:219a-3: de 'dra'i nor ram rin chen rgyal srid kyang //
T04TD3944E:219a-4: byang chub sems dpas blang bar 'os pa min //
T04TD3944E:219a-5: thub pa rnams kyi spyod mchog dran byas shing //
T04TD3944E:219a-6: de gzhol rang gi dam bcas bsam byas te //
T04TD3944E:219a-7: yongs 'dzin chags pa rnam par brtsal ba'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:219a-8: sems la rtogs pa'i dam pa 'di dag rtogs //
T04TD3944E:219a-9: 'gro ba kun la bdag gi lus btang ste //
T04TD3944E:219a-10: de btang chos kyang 'di lhag bdag gis spang bya na ;
T04TD3944E:219a-11: / phyi rol dngos la bdag gis chags bya ba //
T04TD3944E:219a-12: glang po'i khrus bzhin bdag la reg pa min //
T04TD3944E:219a-13: sha la don gnyer sha 'di bskur bar gyis //
T04TD3944E:219a-14: rkang 'dod sems can rkang yang brus te khyer //
T04TD3944E:219a-15: bdag gi lus 'di 'di ltar bskur ba yang //
T04TD3944E:219a-16: 'jig rten don na phyi rol dngos ci smos //
T04TD3944E:219a-17: ji ltar sman gyi sdong po skyes gyur la //
T04TD3944E:219a-18: lo ma me tog skye bo 'thog byed kyang //
T04TD3944E:219a-19: 'di dag bdag la blangs shing khyer byed ces //
T04TD3944E:219a-20: rnam par rtog pa de la rgyu ba med //
T04TD3944E:219a-21: de bzhin 'jig rten don la brtson pa yis //
T04TD3944E:219a-22: drin med rtag tu mi gtsang sdug bsngal ba'i //
T04TD3944E:219a-23: lus 'di gzhan la phan zhing mkho gyur na //
T04TD3944E:219a-24: bdag gir bya snyam rnam rtog chung mi skyed //
T04TD3944E:219a-25: nang gis sa dang chu la sogs pa dang //
T04TD3944E:219a-26: phyi rol 'byung ba chen po'i tshogs mtshungs na //
T04TD3944E:219a-27: 'di ni bdag gi 'di ni gzhan gyi zhes //
T04TD3944E:219a-28: ma rig 'dam gyi rtog bskyed tshul ma yin //
T04TD3944E:219a-29: bdag gi lus kyang ci bder blang bar gyis //
T04TD3944E:219a-30: 'di la gzhan gyi yin snyam blo ma bskyed //
T04TD3944E:219a-31: 'di dag thams cad khyed kyi dngos yin te //
T04TD3944E:219a-32: 'di la bdag gis nga rgyal bdag la med //
T04TD3944E:219a-33: de 'dra'i rmad byung bsam pa rnams dang yang //
T04TD3944E:219a-34: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rjes 'brang ba //
T04TD3944E:219a-35: gang la yod pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes //
T04TD3944E:219a-36: sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab skyes mchog gsungs //
T04TD3944E:219a-37: de ltar sbyin la nan tan brtson pa de //
T04TD3944E:219a-38: lus la nam yang chags par mi byed pas //
T04TD3944E:219a-39: de yi ngag lus yid kyi las rnams kyang //
T04TD3944E:219a-40: lhun gyis grub par rnam par dag par 'dod //
T04TD3944E:219b-0: rnam @219b dag las can gzhan la phan byed na //
T04TD3944E:219b-1: tshogs su 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal med par byed //
T04TD3944E:219b-2: de ltar rigs pa'i tshul la mngon zhugs pa //
T04TD3944E:219b-3: tshul dang tshul min mkhas pa dngos su thob //
T04TD3944E:219b-4: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu spangs pa thob gyur nas //
T04TD3944E:219b-5: srid pa'i mun nang 'thoms pa'i skye bo la //
T04TD3944E:219b-6: dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rgya chen gyis //
T04TD3944E:219b-7: nyi ma shar ba'i 'od pas gsal bar byed //
T04TD3944E:219b-8: 'jig rten phan pa'i don sgrub snyam pa de //
T04TD3944E:219b-9: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'grub gzhir gyur pas //
T04TD3944E:219b-10: nyi shar zer bkye 'od chen mi zad bzhin //
T04TD3944E:219b-11: de yi bsod nams yun du zad mi shes //
T04TD3944E:219b-12: de 'dra rmad byung sbyin pa'i yon tan tshogs //
T04TD3944E:219b-13: de dag byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan gyur pas //
T04TD3944E:219b-14: de phyir sbyin pa snying rje sngon 'gro pa'i sangs rgyas sku mdog gser 'dra dang //
T04TD3944E:219b-15: khrel ltas rgyu las pa sangs rgyas stobs la sogs pa //
T04TD3944E:219b-16: 'gro ba kun la dag gis bsgrub bya zhing //
T04TD3944E:219b-17: zang zing sbyin pas bsdus pa'i sems can dag / bdag gi dam chos snod du 'gyur ro zhes //
T04TD3944E:219b-18: de ltar kha zas skom rnams gtong bar byed //
T04TD3944E:219b-19: rang gi phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub phyir min //
T04TD3944E:219b-20: nyon mongs skom pa gzhil phyir btung ba dag /'jig rten phan byed 'jig rten rnams la gtong//
T04TD3944E:219b-21: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che ba'i rnam pa dang //
T04TD3944E:219b-22: mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba thams cad kyang //
T04TD3944E:219b-23: 'jig rten 'di dag ji ltar thob 'gyur zhes //
T04TD3944E:219b-24: theg chen smos pa theg pa yongs su gtong //
T04TD3944E:219b-25: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku mdog gser 'dra dang //
T04TD3944E:219b-26: khrel ltas rgyu las byung ba'i gos sgrub par //
T04TD3944E:219b-27: gos kyi rnam pa grangs med mang po dag / lus la bde bar rim gro sbyin par byed //
T04TD3944E:219b-28: snying po byang chub gnas phyir stan gtong ste //
T04TD3944E:219b-29: mal gsum don du mal gyi sbyin pa byed //
T04TD3944E:219b-30: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:219b-31: mchod rten gtsug lag khang du mar me dbul //
T04TD3944E:219b-32: lha yi rna ba thob phyir rol mo dang //
T04TD3944E:219b-33: sangs rgyas tshul khrims bsgrub phyir spos kyang 'bul //
T04TD3944E:219b-34: skyabs su 'gro ba yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:219b-35: khyim dang btung gnas ra ba gnas rnams gtong //
T04TD3944E:219b-36: bro ba ro mchog yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:219b-37: shin tu zhim sbyar ro rnams gtong bar byed //
T04TD3944E:220a-1: rten 'di dag rga shi med stobs par //
T04TD3944E:220a-2: sman gyi mchog rnams grangs med sbyin par byed //
T04TD3944E:220a-3: nyon mongs tshogs kyis 'khor ba'i 'jig rten rnams //
T04TD3944E:220a-4: rab byung bdag nyid mnyam par bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:220a-5: de ni rtag tu bran dag gtong byed cing //
T04TD3944E:220a-6: sems can bla med chos kyi rjer yang bsgrub //
T04TD3944E:220a-7: mtshan rab bzang po phun sum tshogs bsgrub par //
T04TD3944E:220a-8: mu tig byi ru gser la sogs pa gtong //
T04TD3944E:220a-9: dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:220a-10: rin chen sgron ma rgyan gyi sbyin pa byed //
T04TD3944E:220a-11: bsam gtan bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs nags tshal dang //
T04TD3944E:220a-12: chos mdzod thob phyir nor mdzod yongs su gtong //
T04TD3944E:220a-13: thub dbang rgyal po thob phyir skyon med par //
T04TD3944E:220a-14: rgyal srid bkas brgyan spyin pa gtong bar byed //
T04TD3944E:220a-15: byang chub mchog la mos phyir skyon med par //
T04TD3944E:220a-16: bu dang bu mo sdug pa'i sbyin pa byed //
T04TD3944E:220a-17: gcig tu chos la dga' zhing mos pa'i phyir ;
T04TD3944E:220a-18: / dga' ba'i rgyur gyur rtsed mo sna tshogs gtong //
T04TD3944E:220a-19: 'khor los brgyan pa'i rkang pa mchog thob ste //
T04TD3944E:220a-20: byang chub snying por gnas pas mos pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:220a-21: 'jig rten don chen bsgrub par brtson pa de //
T04TD3944E:220a-22: rtog pa med par rkang pa yongs su gtong //
T04TD3944E:220a-23: sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skye shi'i chus g-yengs pa'i //
T04TD3944E:220a-24: 'jig rten chos kyi lag pas bskyab po zhes //
T04TD3944E:220a-25: lag pa padma rgyas 'dra gtong bar byed //
T04TD3944E:220a-26: dbang po lnga dag rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:220a-27: sna dang rna ba skyon med yongs su gtong //
T04TD3944E:220a-28: 'jig rten thams cad sgrib pa kun spangs te //
T04TD3944E:220a-29: rnam dag mig ldan bsgrub phyir mig kyang gtong //
T04TD3944E:220a-30: sa chu me dang rlung ltar rtog med cing //
T04TD3944E:220a-31: 'jig rten nyer 'tshor bdag gi lus sgrub ces //
T04TD3944E:220a-32: sha bcad khrag dang bcas pa gtso bo de //
T04TD3944E:220a-33: snying rje chen pos yongs su gtong bar byed //
T04TD3944E:220a-34: rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa brtan pa de //
T04TD3944E:220a-35: rdo rje lta bu'i char pa bab gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:220a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog mi shigs pa //
T04TD3944E:220a-37: 'jig rten kun gyis thob phyir rkang yang gtong //
T04TD3944E:220a-38: 'jig rten blar rgyur ye shes mnyam bzhag phyir //
T04TD3944E:220a-39: skye bo slong du 'ongs pa thams cad la //
T04TD3944E:220a-40: lus kyi dam pa mgos kyang mchod byed na //
T04TD3944E:220b-0: lus kyi yan lag gzhan @220b lta ci zhig smos //
T04TD3944E:220b-1: de la sogs pa rgyun du skyon med par //
T04TD3944E:220b-2: byang chub sems dpa' spyod las yongs btang ba'i //
T04TD3944E:220b-3: sbyin pa'i char gyis 'gro ba'i tshim byas shing //
T04TD3944E:220b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor mngon par 'gro //
T04TD3944E:220b-5: de ni mi rigs btsal zhing sbyin pa dang //
T04TD3944E:220b-6: gzhan la gnod pa btsal zhing sbyin mi bya //
T04TD3944E:220b-7: de la gzhan la btang bas dma' ba med //
T04TD3944E:220b-8: de ni sbyin pas snyems pas bdag mi bstod //
T04TD3944E:220b-9: gzhan la smod pa nam yang byed pa med //
T04TD3944E:220b-10: log pa'i sbyor ba yongs su mi gtong ste //
T04TD3944E:220b-11: lhag pa'i bsam pas ma zin sbyin mi byed //
T04TD3944E:220b-12: khro ba'i skyon gyis dma' bar mi gtong snye ;
T04TD3944E:220b-13: / byin nas de la rjes su 'gyod mi byed //
T04TD3944E:220b-14: gcam byas sgur zhes mang du sbyin mi byed //
T04TD3944E:220b-15: khrel gyis dogs sam 'jigs pa'i rgyu phyir ram //
T04TD3944E:220b-16: sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur phyir gtong ba min //
T04TD3944E:220b-17: bzang po yod bzhin ngan pa gtong ba'am //
T04TD3944E:220b-18: sbyin pa'i gnas min zhes te brnyas pa'am ;
T04TD3944E:220b-19: / rnam smin re bas dogs par byas pa'am //
T04TD3944E:220b-20: rim gro med cing smad par de mi gtong //
T04TD3944E:220b-21: tshul khrims ldan la phul bas mi mthong zhing //
T04TD3944E:220b-22: khengs shing brnyas byed nyung bar gtong ba med //
T04TD3944E:220b-23: gang gis log pa'i nan tan rgyur gyur dang //
T04TD3944E:220b-24: slong ba rnams la gnod par sbyin mi byed ;
T04TD3944E:220b-25: / de ni dus min sbyin par mi byed de //
T04TD3944E:220b-26: dus dang mi mthun sbyin pa'ang de mi byed //
T04TD3944E:220b-27: lhar smon ma yin rgyal por smon phyir min //
T04TD3944E:220b-28: theg pa dman smon tshul gyis gtong mi byed //
T04TD3944E:220b-29: de ni ngor bltas gtong bar mi byed de //
T04TD3944E:220b-30: grags pa'i sgra dang bzhad gad don phyir min //
T04TD3944E:220b-31: bdag gis nus su zad ces mi rlom zhing //
T04TD3944E:220b-32: gzhan gyi srog la gnod phyir sbyin mi byed //
T04TD3944E:220b-33: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par ma bsngos pa'am //
T04TD3944E:220b-34: skyes bu dam pas smad par gtong mi byed //
T04TD3944E:220b-35: de phyir pha rol phyin pa'i ming 'thob cing //
T04TD3944E:220b-36: shin tu rnam dag sbyin par yang dag 'gro //
T04TD3944E:220b-37: de yi sbyin las byung ba'i bsod nams tshogs //
T04TD3944E:220b-38: 'jig rten kun gyi bsod nams yongs bsdus kyang //
T04TD3944E:220b-39: de dag kun gyis zil gnon mi 'gyur bas //
T04TD3944E:220b-40: de phyir 'jig rten kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:220b-41: mngon shes lnga la shin tu nges 'gyur zhing //
T04TD3944E:220b-42: 'jig rten kun la sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pas //
T04TD3944E:221a-1: du de yi tshad mi zin //
T04TD3944E:221a-2: rtag par rgyun du 'byung bas zad mi shes //
T04TD3944E:221a-3: de bas mi zad 'gro la phan par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:221a-4: ye shes mi zad rgya chen rgyu yang yin //
T04TD3944E:221a-5: khams gsum zad par 'gyur ba'i dngos po dang //
T04TD3944E:221a-6: mkha' dang sprin ltar rtag tu 'dre ba med //
T04TD3944E:221a-7: de ni stong nyid rnam par mnyam gzhag cing //
T04TD3944E:221a-8: mtshan ma'i skyon rnams yongs su spang ba dang //
T04TD3944E:221a-9: nyon mongs bsal zhing dman pa med pas na //
T04TD3944E:221a-10: thub dbang chen po rnams kyis mi zad gsungs //
T04TD3944E:221a-11: skyes bu dam pas ched du brjod byas shing //
T04TD3944E:221a-12: bde ba rgya chen rgyu yi sbyin pa ni //
T04TD3944E:221a-13: byed par 'dod pas mi rtag rnal 'byor dang //
T04TD3944E:221a-14: 'jig rten rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed //
T04TD3944E:221a-15: longs spyod rnam pa mi rtag mthong gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:221a-16: snying rje chen po rang gi ngang gyur na //
T04TD3944E:221a-17: byin pa bdag gi khyim bzhag gzhan gyi bar //
T04TD3944E:221a-18: shin tu rig pa'i tshul khrims rtogs par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:221a-19: gang byin de las 'jigs pa skye mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:221a-20: khyim na gang bzhag de las 'jigs pa 'byung //
T04TD3944E:221a-21: mi chog thun mong rtag tu bsrung dgos te //
T04TD3944E:221a-22: byin na nyes pa de dag gnod mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:221a-23: byin pas 'jig rten pha rol bde ba bsgrub //
T04TD3944E:221a-24: ma byin tshe 'di nyid la'ang sdug bsngal bskyed //
T04TD3944E:221a-25: mi yi nor rnams skar mda'i rang bzhin ltar //
T04TD3944E:221a-26: yongs su ma btang de dag med par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:221a-27: ma byin nor rnams mi rtag med 'gyur te //
T04TD3944E:221a-28: byin pas de dag yod pa'i gter du 'gro //
T04TD3944E:221a-29: sems can phan par gzhol bas gang byin pa'i //
T04TD3944E:221a-30: nor rnams snying po med pa'ang yod par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:221a-31: gang zhig yongs su btang ba mkhas pas bsngags //
T04TD3944E:221a-32: skye bo byis pa de dag sog la dga' //
T04TD3944E:221a-33: yongs su bzung bas mi 'bral gang yang med //
T04TD3944E:221a-34: byin pas rtag tu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung //
T04TD3944E:221a-35: btang bas nyon mongs yongs su 'dzin mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:221a-36: 'jungs pa 'phags pa'i lam min nyen mongs bskyed //
T04TD3944E:221a-37: gang zhig byin pa de ni lam gyi mchog / de las gzhan gyur 'phags pas lam ngan gsungs //
T04TD3944E:221a-38: slong ba sngon du 'ongs na rgyal sras des //
T04TD3944E:221a-39: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs ni spel ba'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:221a-40: des gzhan 'du shes bdag la gzhag byas shing //
T04TD3944E:221b-0: dge ba'i @221b bshes gnyen 'du shes de la skyed //
T04TD3944E:221b-1: slong ba 'ongs pa thos na che ba rnams //
T04TD3944E:221b-2: nyon mongs mi dga' rnam par srab 'gyur bas //
T04TD3944E:221b-3: dga' ba'i ston mo chen po 'byung ba bas //
T04TD3944E:221b-4: slong ba sngon du 'ongs la de dag dga' //
T04TD3944E:221b-5: ci ste slong ba sngon du 'ongs gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:221b-6: shin tu mthu chung sbyin par ma nus na //
T04TD3944E:221b-7: ci nas slong ba sma bab ma gyur pa //
T04TD3944E:221b-8: 'jam pa'i tshig gis de yi yid kyang bzho //
T04TD3944E:221b-9: phyin chad slong ba drung du 'ongs gyur na //
T04TD3944E:221b-10: ci nas kho chad dma' bar mi 'gyur bar //
T04TD3944E:221b-11: 'jungs pa'i skyon rnams rnam par bsal ba dang //
T04TD3944E:221b-12: srid pa yongs su spang phyir nan tan bya //
T04TD3944E:221b-13: gang zhig zang zing nor la chags byed pa //
T04TD3944E:221b-14: de la byang chub mchog sems skye ba med //
T04TD3944E:221b-15: sems mchog de ni skyon dang mi 'grogs te //
T04TD3944E:221b-16: rgya mtsho chen po ro dang mi 'grogs bzhin //
T04TD3944E:221b-17: de bas rtag tu skyon rnams kun spangs te //
T04TD3944E:221b-18: byang chub tshol bas rtag tu thams cad sbyin //
T04TD3944E:221b-19: 'jig rten thams cad gcig pu ngas bskyab pa'i //
T04TD3944E:221b-20: sems dang spyod dang zhum pa'i ngang mi mthun //
T04TD3944E:221b-21: sbyin pa de 'dra'i rtsa ba byang chub sems //
T04TD3944E:221b-22: de 'dra'i sbyin pa gtong 'dod de mi gtang //
T04TD3944E:221b-23: 'jig rten nang na gtong 'dod sems ldan pa //
T04TD3944E:221b-24: gtong ba'i nang na mchog ces rgyal bas gsungs //
T04TD3944E:221b-25: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o /
T04TD3944E:221b-27: // / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims brgyan ldan par //
T04TD3944E:221b-28: 'gro ba thams cad bsgrub don gang brtson pa //
T04TD3944E:221b-29: rang gi tshul khrims thog mar yongs su sbyangs //
T04TD3944E:221b-30: tshul khrims dag pa'i mthu yi stobs kyang bskyed //
T04TD3944E:221b-31: ci nas rmi lam rmi yang 'tshe med par ;
T04TD3944E:221b-32: /'jig rten kun la byams pa bskyed par bya //
T04TD3944E:221b-33: gzhan la phan par gcig tu brtson pa des //
T04TD3944E:221b-34: gzhan gyi longs spyod sprul bzhin reg mi bya //
T04TD3944E:221b-35: kha ton spyod pa'i blo las phyir log pas //
T04TD3944E:221b-36: thog mar gzhan gyi bud med bslu ba'i blo //
T04TD3944E:221b-37: yongs su gtang bya 'jig rten phan byed pas //
T04TD3944E:221b-38: lus kyi spyod pa skyes bu mchog ltar bsgrub //
T04TD3944E:221b-39: snyan cing yid 'ong dus dang ldan pa'i tshig / dbyen du mi 'gyur bden dang mthun pa dag / dam chos yang dag khong du chud 'gyur ba //
T04TD3944E:221b-40: gnyen pos btsal zhing rtag tu brjod par bya //
T04TD3944E:221b-41: gzhan gyi bde ba phun sum thob gyur na //
T04TD3944E:222a-1: shas gang zhig bsgrub bya ba //
T04TD3944E:222a-2: de dag kho bdag nyid kyis rnyed gyur ces //
T04TD3944E:222a-3: dga' sems bskyed bya chags sems yongs su spangs //
T04TD3944E:222a-4: nyon mongs dbang gyur bdag phan mi reg par //
T04TD3944E:222a-5: 'di ni bdag nyid mthu chung zhan pa'i mtha' //
T04TD3944E:222a-6: gzhan gyi nyes pa kun kyang de bzhin zhes ;
T04TD3944E:222a-7: / gnod sems me 'bar gzhi la phyir nan tan bya //
T04TD3944E:222a-8: log lta'i 'du shes mun nag thibs po dag / ye shes snang bas yid la gsal byas te //
T04TD3944E:222a-9: lha mi phul gyi yon tan bsgom byas shing //
T04TD3944E:222a-10: dad pa mi 'phrogs rtsa ba brtan par gzugs //
T04TD3944E:222a-11: mtho ris thar pa'i bde lam gyur pa de ;
T04TD3944E:222a-12: / las lam bcu po 'di las nyams mi bya //
T04TD3944E:222a-13: 'di la gnas pa 'gro la phan bsam pa'i //
T04TD3944E:222a-14: bsam pa'i khyad par 'bras bu yod par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:222a-15: ngag lus yid rnams yang dag bsdam bya ba //
T04TD3944E:222a-16: mdor bsdus tshul khrims yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
T04TD3944E:222a-17: tshul khrims ma lus 'dul ba'i gzhi yin pas //
T04TD3944E:222a-18: de phyir 'di dag rnam par sbyang bar gyis //
T04TD3944E:222a-19: srog gcod spangs pa des pa'i ngang 'chang ba //
T04TD3944E:222a-20: 'gro ba thams cad bsten zhing phebs par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:222a-21: de yi bag chags sems la skyon gyur pa //
T04TD3944E:222a-22: nan tan ma byas rang gis yongs su 'chad //
T04TD3944E:222a-23: byams pa'i khyad par rjes mthun sems ldan zhing //
T04TD3944E:222a-24: khon gcugs rnam pa yongs su zhi 'gyur na //
T04TD3944E:222a-25: mya ngan rnam pa'i nyes pa kun spangs shing //
T04TD3944E:222a-26: bde bar de nyal bde bar sad par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:222a-27: gnod sbyin srin po dag kyang phan par byed //
T04TD3944E:222a-28: lam ngan rgyud kyis de la 'jigs pa med //
T04TD3944E:222a-29: nad med yon tan rgyan dang ldan pa yi //
T04TD3944E:222a-30: bde lam brten pa'i tshe ring thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:222a-31: de nyid rgyu yin byang chub brnyes pa yis //
T04TD3944E:222a-32: bde gshegs rnams kyi sku tshe dpag yas shing //
T04TD3944E:222a-33: 'jig rten bde ba skyed cing don mdzad pa //
T04TD3944E:222a-34: dgongs pa'i rjes su snyegs pa yongs su 'grub //
T04TD3944E:222a-35: gzhan gyi longs spyod ma byin ma blangs pas //
T04TD3944E:222a-36: 'jig rten gzhan du longs spyod rgya chen dag / bud med dbugs kyis ri rab mi sgul ltar //
T04TD3944E:222a-37: bgo skal ba dang 'phrogs pas mi 'phrogs 'grub //
T04TD3944E:222a-38: spyod pa dag pas kun gyis yid 'ong zhing //
T04TD3944E:222a-39: ston pa'i snod du tshe 'di nyid la 'grub //
T04TD3944E:222b-0: de phyir pha @222b rol du yang dogs med cing //
T04TD3944E:222b-1: lam gyi gegs su gyur pa'i rnam pa med //
T04TD3944E:222b-2: skyid longs yengs la snying po med rtogs pas //
T04TD3944E:222b-3: ched du ma bsgrubs sbyin pa'i ngang du 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:222b-4: de phyir nye ba'i nyon mongs rnam dag pas //
T04TD3944E:222b-5: bla na med pa'i byang chub ngang gis thob //
T04TD3944E:222b-6: 'dod pa rnams la log par spyod spangs pas //
T04TD3944E:222b-7: dbang po thul phyir rab tu zhi la mos //
T04TD3944E:222b-8: 'jig rten bstod pas phyogs rnams kun gyi mthar //
T04TD3944E:222b-9: grags pa khyab 'gro gsal ba kun thob 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:222b-10: bud med kun la ma ltar bltas pas na //
T04TD3944E:222b-11: nyon mongs 'dod chags gang la'ang mi 'byung ste //
T04TD3944E:222b-12: de phyir de yi bsod nams bsags pas na //
T04TD3944E:222b-13: thub dbang skyes chen dbang po mtshan ldan 'grub //
T04TD3944E:222b-14: tshig tu gang smras brdzun las phyir bzlog pas //
T04TD3944E:222b-15: rab tu dga' ldan g-yo sgyu rnam dag sems //
T04TD3944E:222b-16: tshig rnams kun gyis blang bar grub gyur pas //
T04TD3944E:222b-17: sems can mang po chos gzhom kun gyis 'grub //
T04TD3944E:222b-18: bden dang ldan la lha rnams byams gyur pa //
T04TD3944E:222b-19: lha yi rang bzhin yon tan phyogs byed pa //
T04TD3944E:222b-20: de yi spyod pa kun la mngon sum pas //
T04TD3944E:222b-21: 'di 'dra de la ngo mtshar che ba med //
T04TD3944E:222b-22: 'jig rten gzhan byams tshad mar byed pa ni //
T04TD3944E:222b-23: 'jig rten phal cher yon tan mi 'chang la //
T04TD3944E:222b-24: rang gi tshad kyis gzhan la tshod 'dzin kyang //
T04TD3944E:222b-25: de 'drar gyur pa de ni ngo mtshar che //
T04TD3944E:222b-26: me tog autpala yi nags bor zhing //
T04TD3944E:222b-27: bde ldan kha ni padmo 'phags tshul du //
T04TD3944E:222b-28: dri zhim sim byed yid du 'ong ba dang //
T04TD3944E:222b-29: de yi mkha' la gnas 'cha' rten par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:222b-30: ye shes 'bar ba ngan 'gro'i skar lta bu //
T04TD3944E:222b-31: rigs dang mi rigs rnam par shes gyur pas //
T04TD3944E:222b-32: ci dga' sdug pa'i rnam rtog byung gyur na //
T04TD3944E:222b-33: bdag nyid dbang du gyur pa khrel gyis 'dzem //
T04TD3944E:222b-34: de ltar rang bzhin rnam dag tshul gyur pas //
T04TD3944E:222b-35: gzhan la dogs med gzhan gyi dogs mi bya//
T04TD3944E:222b-36: de phyir de yi bden pa'i rjes bsnyegs tshig / sangs rgyas grub tshe bsrung ba med par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:222b-37: phra ma dbyen spangs g-yog 'khor mi 'phrogs shing //
T04TD3944E:222b-38: gzhan gyi gnod pas lus la mi tshugs te //
T04TD3944E:222b-39: nan tan lhur byed dad pa dbyer med 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223a-2: 'gro don mi gtong snying rje mi nyams thob //
T04TD3944E:223a-3: thub dbang grub tshe slob ma'i dge 'dun yang //
T04TD3944E:223a-4: tshe rabs bskal pas phyi bar mi 'gyur 'grub //
T04TD3944E:223a-5: khro ba'i rdul mang dpung du gyur pa la //
T04TD3944E:223a-6: rnam rtog rlung gis kun du 'tshub pa rnams //
T04TD3944E:223a-7: grags pa'i lus la grib mar 'gyur ro zhes //
T04TD3944E:223a-8: zhe gcod rnam pa byams pa'i chus bkrus shing //
T04TD3944E:223a-9: de las phyi rol tshig snyan 'jam pa yis //
T04TD3944E:223a-10: 'jig rten bsam pa bde ba'i dbang du 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223a-11: 'jig rten dga' ba rtsa ba zug gyur pas //
T04TD3944E:223a-12: de yi tshig ni kun gyis blang zhing gzung //
T04TD3944E:223a-13: de phyir 'jig rten rnam pa brgyar btul zhing //
T04TD3944E:223a-14: de dag sdug bsngal lam ngan gcad bya ste //
T04TD3944E:223a-15: bsod nams las ldan 'di dang pha rol du //
T04TD3944E:223a-16: chos kyi tshul bsrungs ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223a-17: rgyang ring gnas nas zab gsal grags pa dang //
T04TD3944E:223a-18: dpal ldan nye na rang bzhin bde skye ba //
T04TD3944E:223a-19: de bzhin 'brug sgra zab la gsal ba yi //
T04TD3944E:223a-20: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kha yi rgyan kyang byed //
T04TD3944E:223a-21: 'khyal ba'i tshig las phyir log gyur pas na //
T04TD3944E:223a-22: mkhas pa rnams la shin tu dben par 'gro //
T04TD3944E:223a-23: de yi blo yang bden par smra mos pas //
T04TD3944E:223a-24: skyon med che ba nyid kyang des thob po //
T04TD3944E:223a-25: bsod nams des na thub pa'i rgyal gyur tshe //
T04TD3944E:223a-26: dka' zhing zab pa yongs su bris pa yi //
T04TD3944E:223a-27: zhu ba rnam mang grangs med dus gcig tu //
T04TD3944E:223a-28: thogs pa med pa'i tshig gis lung yang ston //
T04TD3944E:223a-29: chags sems don med 'di dang pha rol du //
T04TD3944E:223a-30: gnod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub byed blos gsal te //
T04TD3944E:223a-31: phrag dog med pas bsam pa ji bzhin du ;
T04TD3944E:223a-32: / phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod rgyas pa thob //
T04TD3944E:223a-33: rnam shes dag pas de la brten pa yi //
T04TD3944E:223a-34: lus ngag yid kyi las kyang shin tu gtsang //
T04TD3944E:223a-35: dus dang mthun pas gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings la //
T04TD3944E:223a-36: skar tshogs dri med dkyil 'khor ji bzhin 'bar //
T04TD3944E:223a-37: de yi longs spyod mchog rnams bsod nams la //
T04TD3944E:223a-38: rtag tu sbyar ba de yi blo 'jug ste //
T04TD3944E:223a-39: khengs pa nga rgyal can gyis glags med cing //
T04TD3944E:223a-40: rgyal po dag gis de ni bstan par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223a-41: de yi las dges bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bas //
T04TD3944E:223a-42: dbang po nam yang nyams par 'gro ba med //
T04TD3944E:223a-43: de phyir 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod 'os pa'i //
T04TD3944E:223b-0: @223b 'khor lo zlog byed ston pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223b-1: gnod sems gdung ba'i rims nad yongs bsal zhing //
T04TD3944E:223b-2: rang bzhin dge tshul phun sum tshogs pas na //
T04TD3944E:223b-3: shin tu zhi zhing gsal ba'i ngang tshul gyis //
T04TD3944E:223b-4: yid kyis mos pa shin tu gsal bar 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223b-5: byams pa'i ro bde khyad par thob pas na //
T04TD3944E:223b-6: 'tshe ba'i tshul lam 'thab mo 'khrug ldan dang //
T04TD3944E:223b-7: 'phags min spyod pa las ngan rnam pa la //
T04TD3944E:223b-8: de yi blo ni nam yang 'jug mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223b-9: las rung 'jam pa'i yid kyi las ldan sa //
T04TD3944E:223b-10: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de la dkon pa med //
T04TD3944E:223b-11: 'jig rten kun du 'phags dang mnyam 'gyur zhing //
T04TD3944E:223b-12: 'gro bas lha bzhin gus pas mchod par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223b-13: sems can kun la phan dga' yang dang yang //
T04TD3944E:223b-14: dbyar gyis bsnyogs pa'i chu klung chu bo dag / ston dus gsal bar dangs [?] par bya ba bzhin //
T04TD3944E:223b-15: 'gro ba kun gyi yid la dang ba bskyed //
T04TD3944E:223b-16: kun gyis blta na yid 'ong bzang ba dang //
T04TD3944E:223b-17: ye shes rgyus byung tshul mchog rmad byung ba //
T04TD3944E:223b-18: 'jig rten rnam shes so sor bsgrub pa dag / sangs rgyas bsgrub tshe rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub //
T04TD3944E:223b-19: log par lta ba'i 'dam la mi 'dug na //
T04TD3944E:223b-20: de bas bsgrub pa'i grogs dang phrad par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223b-21: rang gi las bzhin 'gyur bar lam mthong bas //
T04TD3944E:223b-22: sdig pa'i las rnams de ni yongs su spongs //
T04TD3944E:223b-23: rgyal ba rnams la dad pa mi bzlogs shing //
T04TD3944E:223b-24: ngo mtshar bkra shis rnams kyis nyon mongs med //
T04TD3944E:223b-25: 'phags pa'i lam la gnas pa de 'thob ste //
T04TD3944E:223b-26: de phyir de ni khyad par 'gro ba 'thob //
T04TD3944E:223b-27: 'jig tshogs lta bas yang dag 'phags pas na //
T04TD3944E:223b-28: rgyu rnams thad phyir ngan 'gror de mi 'gro //
T04TD3944E:223b-29: chags med ye shes mchog dang de ldan pas //
T04TD3944E:223b-30: sa dang mtho ris chags pa med par 'gro //
T04TD3944E:223b-31: 'gro ba'i don la mthu che dpa' ba yi //
T04TD3944E:223b-32: thams cad mkhyen myur rgyal dbang chos kyi rnams //
T04TD3944E:223b-33: rang rgyal la sogs thob par ma gyur pa'ang //
T04TD3944E:223b-34: thams cad de la de phyir mngon du 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:223b-35: de 'dra'i longs spyod yon tan rgyan ldan zhing //
T04TD3944E:223b-36: rang la dbang yod bsgom 'os de dga'i rgyu //
T04TD3944E:223b-37: mkhas pa su zhig yang dag len mi byed //
T04TD3944E:223b-38: sems can phan dga' de len ci zhig smos //
T04TD3944E:224a-2: bde mchog ro mchog lha yi phun sum tshogs //
T04TD3944E:224a-3: tshul khrims rgyus byung ci zhig ngo mtshar che //
T04TD3944E:224a-4: sangs rgyas chos rnams de las byung ba ltos //
T04TD3944E:224a-5: tshul khrims nyams pas rang don mi nus na //
T04TD3944E:224a-6: gzhan don tshul la mthu yod ga la 'ong //
T04TD3944E:224a-7: de phyir gzhan don legs par brtson pa yis //
T04TD3944E:224a-8: 'di la rim gro glod par rigs pa min //
T04TD3944E:224a-9: de bas mi bzad 'jigs pa mthong bya zhing //
T04TD3944E:224a-10: spang 'os chung yang rnam par spang bar gyis //
T04TD3944E:224a-11: byang chub sems dpas lung bstan tshul khrims dag / rang gi bde la brkam pas bral mi bya ;
T04TD3944E:224a-12: / bud med lus dang tshul spyad mthong stsogs pa'i //
T04TD3944E:224a-13: skabs kyi nyes pas shag shig tshul mi bcang //
T04TD3944E:224a-14: mi srun skye bo nyon mongs rnam pas kyang //
T04TD3944E:224a-15: tshul khrims 'dran 'dren rnam pa yongs su spangs //
T04TD3944E:224a-16: gcig tu dkar chos tshogs ni bsags byas shing //
T04TD3944E:224a-17: rnyog dang rnam bral tshul khrims bsten par bya //
T04TD3944E:224a-18: rang dbang gyur las nyams su bde ba dang //
T04TD3944E:224a-19: mkhas pas bsngags pa'i rgyan ldan tshul khrims bsrung //
T04TD3944E:224a-20: bslab pa'i gnas skabs tshang bar yongs rdzogs pas //
T04TD3944E:224a-21: kun rdzob bsnyems med tshul khrims yang dag bsten //
T04TD3944E:224a-22: rnam dag sems la gzugs brnyan gyur pa yi //
T04TD3944E:224a-23: gzhan don ro gcig sbyor bas de dag bsrung //
T04TD3944E:224a-24: dran pa'i gzhi ldan dbang po bsdams byas shing //
T04TD3944E:224a-25: tshul khrims bsrung la shin tu brtson par bya //
T04TD3944E:224a-26: 'jig rten tshul khrims 'chal pa mang po'i mun //
T04TD3944E:224a-27: nyi ma'i 'od kyis gsal ba ji bzhin gsal ;
T04TD3944E:224a-28: / sdug bsngal gnyen po'i don du bsten pa yang //
T04TD3944E:224a-29: lus kyi rma bsku'i rdul la sogs pa dang //
T04TD3944E:224a-30: rigs pas 'thob pas cho ga bsam byas shing //
T04TD3944E:224a-31: gzhan gdong lta ba'i re ba med par bya //
T04TD3944E:224a-32: tshul dang mthun zhing yon tan 'byung ba'i rgyu //
T04TD3944E:224a-33: yid bzhin dga' ba kun gyi spyod gyur kyang /
T04TD3944E:224a-34: ngo mtshar med pas nga rgyal spang bya zhing //
T04TD3944E:224a-35: de las byung ba'i grags pa bsnyems mi bya //
T04TD3944E:224a-36: thob pa'i yon tan rnam pa gzugs brnyan dag / mdza' ba'i tshul gyis dgra dang nye ba bzhin //
T04TD3944E:224a-37: padma'i nags la zla ba'i 'od gsal ltar //
T04TD3944E:224a-38: brtul zhugs lhod pa rnams la bde ba gnod //
T04TD3944E:224b-0: tshul @224b khrims yon tan bsgom pa'i tshul du gsungs //
T04TD3944E:224b-1: yon tan ma lus byang chub sems la gnas //
T04TD3944E:224b-2: byang chub mchog sems snying rje'i rgyu las byung //
T04TD3944E:224b-3: de bas snying rje'i dang tshul ldan par bya //
T04TD3944E:224b-4: gang zhig 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas shing //
T04TD3944E:224b-5: gzugs kyi khams la'ang de bzhin mi gnas te //
T04TD3944E:224b-6: gzugs med khams la'ang de bzhin mi brten pa //
T04TD3944E:224b-7: de ni tshul khrims yang dag yin par brjod //
T04TD3944E:224b-8: gang zhig 'jig rten dpag yas sems can dag / mtha' dag tshul khrims dag la dgod mos shing //
T04TD3944E:224b-9: 'jig rten rngan phyir tshul khrims sten byed pa //
T04TD3944E:224b-11: tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs //
T04TD3944E:224b-12: de bas ngan song 'jigs dang rgyal srid dang //
T04TD3944E:224b-13: mtho ris phun sum tshogs pa smon btsal te //
T04TD3944E:224b-14: tshul khrims dri med yang dag bsrung bya zhing //
T04TD3944E:224b-15: 'jig rten don la brtson pas tshul khrims bsten //
T04TD3944E:224b-16: tshul khrims de ni khyad par thob pa'i lam //
T04TD3944E:224b-17: snying rjes dang can rnams dang mnyam par bsgrub //
T04TD3944E:224b-18: ye shes gtsang ma lus kyi rang bzhin te //
T04TD3944E:224b-19: skyon bral rgyan du 'gyur ba'i mchog ces bya //
T04TD3944E:224b-20: khams gsum kun du yid 'ong dri bsung dang //
T04TD3944E:224b-21: rab tu byung dang mi 'gal byug pa yin //
T04TD3944E:224b-22: cha lugs mthun yang tshul khrims ldan gyur na /
T04TD3944E:224b-23: mi yin nang na de ni 'phags par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:224b-24: tshig tu ma brjod tshigs su ma gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:224b-25: nyams su mkho ba'i longs spyod rim gro 'du //
T04TD3944E:224b-26: sdig pa med par 'jig rten kun sdud de //
T04TD3944E:224b-27: chags med ma bsgrubs dbang phyug thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:224b-28: brjod du mi 'os rigs su 'byung ba dang //
T04TD3944E:224b-29: phan zhing dben pa gang yang ma byas shing //
T04TD3944E:224b-30: sngon chad mi shes skye bo thams cad dang //
T04TD3944E:224b-31: tshul khrims ldan pa'i skye bo de la 'dud //
T04TD3944E:224b-32: rkang pas bkra shis gyur pa'i rdul dag kyang //
T04TD3944E:224b-33: spyi gtsug dam pas blangs shing lha dang mi //
T04TD3944E:224b-34: phyag 'tshal mgos gtugs thob pa kun du khyer //
T04TD3944E:224b-35: de phyir tshul khrims dpal ldan rigs mchog yin //
T04TD3944E:224b-36: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o /
T04TD3944E:224b-38: // / bdud rnams thams cad yongs su rmongs byed cing //
T04TD3944E:224b-39: rnam thar thob byed bde bar gang gsungs pa'i //
T04TD3944E:224b-40: bzod pa shin tu phan pa sgrub byed pa //
T04TD3944E:225a-0: de la su zhig nan tan mi byed @225a * //
T04TD3944E:225a-2: / gzhan la gnod byed nam yang mi shes pa //
T04TD3944E:225a-3: brtan pa rnams kyi yid 'ong ngang tshul te //
T04TD3944E:225a-4: 'jig rten don byed snying rje'i tshul bsnyems pa //
T04TD3944E:225a-5: yon tan mthun pa'i ming ni bzod pa yin //
T04TD3944E:225a-6: gzhan don mthun pa'i yid dang ldan pa la //
T04TD3944E:225a-7: tshul gyi dam pa bzod pa yin zhes gsungs //
T04TD3944E:225a-8: 'jig rten legs pa phun sum tshogs pa dag / khro ba'i skyon la bzod pas yongs su skyob //
T04TD3944E:225a-9: mthu ldan rnams kyi rgyan gyi dam pa ste //
T04TD3944E:225a-10: dka' thub tshul 'chang rnams la stobs kyi tshul //
T04TD3944E:225a-11: gnod sems 'brog gi me la chu yi rgyun //
T04TD3944E:225a-12: 'di la gzhan la gnod dgu bzod pas sel //
T04TD3944E:225a-13: skye bo mchog gi bzod pa'i go cha la //
T04TD3944E:225a-14: mi srun skye bo'i tshig gi mdas rdugs pas //
T04TD3944E:225a-15: de dag bstod pa'i me tog bzang 'gyur zhing //
T04TD3944E:225a-16: grags pa'i phreng ba yid du 'ong bar 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:225a-17: skye bo gdug pa'i ngag gi mtshon gyi rma //
T04TD3944E:225a-18: ye shes zla ba bzhin du sim par byed //
T04TD3944E:225a-19: brtul zhugs 'chang ba brtan pa'i rang bzhin te //
T04TD3944E:225a-20: bzod pa de ni yod tan tshogs kyi gnas //
T04TD3944E:225a-21: zab cing brtan pa'i snying por gyur pa ste //
T04TD3944E:225a-22: khro ba'i gdung ba gzhil ba dbyar dang 'dra //
T04TD3944E:225a-23: yon tan rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis brlabs pa yi //
T04TD3944E:225a-24: sgra snyan khyab pa bzod pa'i mthu las byung //
T04TD3944E:225a-25: tshangs ris 'jig rten dag tu 'dzegs pa la /
T04TD3944E:225a-26: skas kyi them bzhin skyo ba'i skon dang bral //
T04TD3944E:225a-27: yon tan mdzes ldan mtshan rab brgyan pa yi //
T04TD3944E:225a-28: gzugs bsgrub bzo yi gnas kyang bzod pa yin //
T04TD3944E:225a-29: skyon gyi shing chen khon bzod chu bo bzhin //
T04TD3944E:225a-30: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis spel ba yin //
T04TD3944E:225a-31: bsod nams chu yi tshogs dang rtag tu mthun //
T04TD3944E:225a-32: 'jig rten gzhan du phan dge rdzogs par bsgrub //
T04TD3944E:225a-33: 'gro la phan don 'phel ba'i mchog kyang yin //
T04TD3944E:225a-34: grags pa'i snyan pa'i rang bzhin phul gyi rgyu //
T04TD3944E:225a-35: yon tan yid bsgrub gnas kyang bzod pa yin /
T04TD3944E:225a-36: snying rjes sems can dben par mthong bas na //
T04TD3944E:225a-37: 'khor ba'i nyes pas de ni skyo mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:225a-38: rang gi las dge 'jig rten phan byed pas //
T04TD3944E:225a-39: 'jig rten kun du grags pa'i tshogs su 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:225a-40: ye shes mchog gis sbyangs pa'i bzod ldan na //
T04TD3944E:225b-0: mtshar 'dzin dpya ba kun gyis 'go @225b ba med ;
T04TD3944E:225b-1: / mi rtag bzod pa'i mthu dang ldan pas na //
T04TD3944E:225b-2: bde ba'i rnam pas dga' bar 'gyur ba med //
T04TD3944E:225b-3: gnod pa'i rnam pa mi bzad mang pos kyang //
T04TD3944E:225b-4: skyes mchog de dag yid ni 'gyur ba med //
T04TD3944E:225b-5: bzod pa'i stobs kyis shin tu brtan pa na //
T04TD3944E:225b-6: byang chub mchog sgrub mos pa med bar 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:225b-7: bzod pas brtan pa'i spyod pa dam pa des //
T04TD3944E:225b-8: dka' thub dka' ba kun du ston byed cing //
T04TD3944E:225b-9: mu stegs dregs pas mtho ba'i bsam pa dag / phan pa'i bsam pas bcil zhing dma' bar byed //
T04TD3944E:225b-10: 'jig rten rmongs pa bdag sum chags gyur te //
T04TD3944E:225b-11: lhag ma gzhan snyam nga rgyal 'chang ba dag / de yi gnod pas zil gnon sems gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:225b-12: bzod dang mi ldan yongs su gdung bar 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:225b-13: skyes mchog bsam pa snying rje'i mgon ldan zhing //
T04TD3944E:225b-14: bzod pas bkra shis bsgrub pa 'chang ba dang //
T04TD3944E:225b-15: bdag tu lta ba yongs su spangs pa la //
T04TD3944E:225b-16: gnod byed gzhan dang nye yang gnod pa med //
T04TD3944E:225b-17: brtan pa nyam chung sems kyi skyon gyur pa'i //
T04TD3944E:225b-18: khro ba log pa rnam par rtog las byung //
T04TD3944E:225b-19: yang dag rtog pa yid la zhi skye zhing //
T04TD3944E:225b-20: bzod pa'i rnam pa mnyam par gzhog par byed //
T04TD3944E:225b-21: chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yod 'dra ba'i //
T04TD3944E:225b-22: bzod pa'i rnam rtog zhi la brten pa las //
T04TD3944E:225b-23: 'phags pas rtag tu skabs med 'phags par bya //
T04TD3944E:225b-24: rnam rtog zhi ba don dam bzod pa zhes //
T04TD3944E:225b-25: bzod pa'i yang dag nyid mkhyen de dag gsungs //
T04TD3944E:225b-26: de bas 'jig rten mi 'dra rtogs bya zhing //
T04TD3944E:225b-27: rnam rtog nye bar zhi la nan tan gyis //
T04TD3944E:225b-28: mig ni mig tu zad na ci ste khro //
T04TD3944E:225b-29: rna ba la sogs der zad khro med ces //
T04TD3944E:225b-30: de ltar gang bzod skye mched ltos pa ste //
T04TD3944E:225b-31: de ni don dam nyid du bzod pa min //
T04TD3944E:225b-32: sgra dang tshig ni mi rtag rang bzhin te //
T04TD3944E:225b-33: sgra dang rnam rtog 'di yang mi rtog [?] ces //
T04TD3944E:225b-34: gang bzod de ni mi rtag rtog pa ste //
T04TD3944E:225b-35: bzod pa'i mchog tu de yang gsungs pa min //
T04TD3944E:225b-36: nyes pa byed pa gang la'ang yod pa min //
T04TD3944E:225b-37: gang la bya ba de yang med do zhes //
T04TD3944E:225b-38: gang bzod de ni bdag med sbyar ba ste //
T04TD3944E:225b-39: de yang bzod pa'i phul du phyir pa min //
T04TD3944E:225b-40: bde dang sdug bsngal bstod dang smad pa dag / kun kyang rten cing 'brel 'byung dngos po zhes //
T04TD3944E:226a-2: bzod pa shin tu mnyam bzhag de ma yin //
T04TD3944E:226a-3: 'di ni yongs su rmongs pas bslus gyur pas //
T04TD3944E:226a-4: bsam pa log gyur de 'dra bdag min zhes //
T04TD3944E:226a-5: gang bzod de ni mthon dman bsam pa ste //
T04TD3944E:226a-6: bzod pa'i phul gyi go skabs de la med //
T04TD3944E:226a-7: sgra skad yi ge sgra snyan ji bzhin te //
T04TD3944E:226a-8: re re brjod cing de bzhin 'jig pas na //
T04TD3944E:226a-9: su la su zhig ji ltar gnod 'gyur zhes //
T04TD3944E:226a-10: bzod pa de yang bzod pa'i phul ma yin //
T04TD3944E:226a-11: 'di ni bdag gi sdig pa zad bya'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:226a-12: rang gi chos la gnod pa'ang mi lta na //
T04TD3944E:226a-13: bde gshegs dam pa ci ro ba ma yin zhes //
T04TD3944E:226a-14: gang bzod de ni ming tsam bzod pa min //
T04TD3944E:226a-15: rang gi las bzhin 'gyur ba rtogs bya zhing //
T04TD3944E:226a-16: de yi yon tan rdzogs pas bzod byed pa //
T04TD3944E:226a-17: de 'dra'i bzod pa'ang rnam rtog sbyor can te //
T04TD3944E:226a-18: bzod pa'i mthar phyin mchog ni de ma yin //
T04TD3944E:226a-19: mi rtag sdug bsngal mi gtsang bdag med pa //
T04TD3944E:226a-20: bdag la bzod kyi bzlog pa ma yin zhes //
T04TD3944E:226a-21: gang yin de ni gnyen po zhi bzod kyi //
T04TD3944E:226a-22: gnyis kyi rjes 'brang don dam bzod pa min //
T04TD3944E:226a-23: skye bo 'di ni yang dag mi shes pas //
T04TD3944E:226a-24: de phyir gzhan la gnod par dga'o zhes //
T04TD3944E:226a-25: gang bzod de yang mnyam nyid mnyam mi 'gro//
T04TD3944E:226a-26: bzod pa de yang rnam rtog skyon can yin //
T04TD3944E:226a-27: mtho dman mnyam pa'i rnam rtog rnam pa dag / gang tshe ma lus yang dag zhi gyur pa //
T04TD3944E:226a-28: de ni bzod pa bla med dam pa zhes //
T04TD3944E:226a-29: gnyis med lam la spyod pa de dag gsungs //
T04TD3944E:226a-30: rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga rgyu med las //
T04TD3944E:226a-31: dngos po gang yang 'byung ba med pa dang //
T04TD3944E:226a-32: rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga rgyu med las //
T04TD3944E:226a-33: dngos po gang yang 'jig par 'gyur ba med //
T04TD3944E:226a-34: yod dang med la skye ba med pas na //
T04TD3944E:226a-35: skye ba med phyir gang yang 'gag pa med //
T04TD3944E:226a-36: dngos po'i rnam rtog rang bzhin stong pa nyid //
T04TD3944E:226a-37: yang dag mthong na bzod pa'i phul zhes bya ;
T04TD3944E:226a-38: / de thob gyur na rgyal ba 'dir 'gyur zhes //
T04TD3944E:226a-39: rgyal ba rnams kyis rnam mang lung yang bstan //
T04TD3944E:226a-40: de ni rtag tu yang dag mnyam gzhag kyang //
T04TD3944E:226a-41: 'jig rten phan 'dod grangs med kun du 'byung //
T04TD3944E:226a-42: chos dang smon lam las la dbang thob ste //
T04TD3944E:226b-0: mos pa rdzu 'phrul skye ba'i dbang @226b yang thob //
T04TD3944E:226b-1: de bzhin sems dang yo byad rnam pa dang //
T04TD3944E:226b-2: ye shes mchog dang tshe la dbang ba thob //
T04TD3944E:226b-3: dbang gi nor mchog yun du mi zad cing //
T04TD3944E:226b-4: gzhan don tshe sgrub de 'dra thob gyur nas //
T04TD3944E:226b-5: 'gro ba mi bde'i rgyun du ltung ba dag / yongs su bzung phyir dbang ldan de dag skye //
T04TD3944E:226b-6: de phyir gzhan don phal cher bkur spro bas //
T04TD3944E:226b-7: bzod pa thabs tshul 'di 'dra bsnyen par bya //
T04TD3944E:226b-8: de la gnas la gzhan don che bsam pa'i //
T04TD3944E:226b-9: spyod yul yon tan 'bras bu'i rgyan ldan 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:226b-10: 'di la dad pa rtsa ba brtan gyur na //
T04TD3944E:226b-11: des kyang thub rgyal nges par 'gyur zhes gsungs //
T04TD3944E:226b-12: chos kyi lam la dad pa rgyun chags na //
T04TD3944E:226b-13: bsam pa yid bzhin shing rta chag mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:226b-14: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o /
T04TD3944E:226b-16: // / thams cad bzod pa'i mthu ni skyes gyur nas //
T04TD3944E:226b-17: spyod pa'i mthu chen mtha' dka' brtson 'grus kyis //
T04TD3944E:226b-18: dpa' bo brtul zhugs thams cad rtsom byed pas //
T04TD3944E:226b-19: lha'am bdud rnams las kyang 'phags par 'gro //
T04TD3944E:226b-20: tshe 'dir mthar phyin 'jig rten don dag kyang //
T04TD3944E:226b-21: brtson 'grus med pas mthar phyin bya ba dka' //
T04TD3944E:226b-22: yongs su skyo med brtson 'grus che ldan na //
T04TD3944E:226b-23: mi 'thob mi 'grub rnam pa gang yang med ;
T04TD3944E:226b-24: / skye bo ma rabs thog mar brtsams mi mos //
T04TD3944E:226b-25: brtsams nas dbus su sgyid lug brtson 'grus gtong //
T04TD3944E:226b-26: gzhan don ngal med brtson 'grus ldan pa ni //
T04TD3944E:226b-27: mya ngan 'das stong spyod pa rgya chen rtsom //
T04TD3944E:226b-28: le los bslus pa'i 'gro ba phal cher ni //
T04TD3944E:226b-29: brtson 'grus rang dbang yod kyang bdag don gtong //
T04TD3944E:226b-30: brtson 'grus che ldan gzhan la ltos med ni //
T04TD3944E:226b-31: gzhan don khur chen skyo ba med par 'khyer //
T04TD3944E:226b-32: snga phyi 'khor ba'i mtha' dang mnyam tsam du //
T04TD3944E:226b-33: rgya che ring ba'i nyin dang mtshan gyur la //
T04TD3944E:226b-34: de 'dra bsags pas lo gyur dus ring ba'i //
T04TD3944E:226b-35: bskal pa rgya mtsho'i chu thigs grangs snyed kyis //
T04TD3944E:226b-36: byang chub mchog gi sems gcig skye 'gyur ba //
T04TD3944E:226b-37: de 'dra'i rnam pas tshogs gzhan de re zhing //
T04TD3944E:226b-38: bsgrub dgos gyur kyang snying rjes skyo bsal te //
T04TD3944E:226b-39: byang chub dam pa sgyid lug med par bsgrub //
T04TD3944E:226b-40: 'khor tshe rang gi sdug bsngal sems gtang zhing //
T04TD3944E:227a-2: brtul zhugs dpa' bo snying rje'i ngang can la //
T04TD3944E:227a-3: yang dag blangs pa dang po yin par brjod //
T04TD3944E:227a-4: 'jig rten mes bkang rkang gis 'bog bya zhing //
T04TD3944E:227a-5: sa chen mtshon gyis dkrigs pas gzigs byas te //
T04TD3944E:227a-6: bde gshegs lta bar mos dang gang ldan zhing //
T04TD3944E:227a-7: chos kyi bdud rtsi zhi ba mchog bsrung dang //
T04TD3944E:227a-8: 'khor ba'i 'dam nas skye bo 'di dag kun //
T04TD3944E:227a-9: bdag gis bton te byang chub bde dgod ces //
T04TD3944E:227a-10: goms pa bteg cing bor ba'i dus dag tu //
T04TD3944E:227a-11: gang zhig de 'drar mnyam 'jog sems 'chang dang //
T04TD3944E:227a-12: 'jig rten phan phyir brtson 'grus che bskyed cing //
T04TD3944E:227a-13: gzhan la phan pa'i bsod nams mang bsgrubs pa //
T04TD3944E:227a-14: de ni mi zad pa yi brtson 'grus te //
T04TD3944E:227a-15: dpal ldan yang dag blangs pa gnyis zhes bya //
T04TD3944E:227a-16: bsod nams rnam pa ci sgrub dus na yang //
T04TD3944E:227a-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du sngo byed na //
T04TD3944E:227a-18: de ni mi zad yang dag bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:227a-19: yang dag len pa'i mchog ces thub pas gsungs //
T04TD3944E:227a-20: rgya mtsho chen por chu thigs gcig bor ba //
T04TD3944E:227a-21: rgya mtsho ma zad dus su zad mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:227a-22: de bzhin byang chub mchog tu bsngos pa yi //
T04TD3944E:227a-23: bsod nams rnam pa zad par 'gyur ba med //
T04TD3944E:227a-24: de yang snying rje rnam dag sems ldan zhing //
T04TD3944E:227a-25: 'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyu ma lus kun //
T04TD3944E:227a-26: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par bsgrub bya zhes //
T04TD3944E:227a-27: sems can dam pa bsod nams de dag rtsom //
T04TD3944E:227a-28: stong gsum chen po'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa //
T04TD3944E:227a-29: nyi ma gcig gis la la sgrol byed la //
T04TD3944E:227a-30: bskal pa du mar de bzhin bsgral byas kyang //
T04TD3944E:227a-31: sems can khams las mang po ma bsgral zhes //
T04TD3944E:227a-32: sems can mi zad de 'dra thos gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:227a-33: ma lus sems can bsgral bar rab mos shing //
T04TD3944E:227a-34: sgyid lug skyon gyis ma bzung brtson ldan na //
T04TD3944E:227a-35: don gyi snying po de la ring ba min //
T04TD3944E:227a-36: 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gcig bsgrub pa //
T04TD3944E:227a-37: de snyed bcu 'gyur bsgyur bas bde gshegs kyi //
T04TD3944E:227a-38: ba spu'i khung gcig mngon par 'grub 'gyur la //
T04TD3944E:227a-39: spu rnams gcig nas re rer mngon 'grub cing //
T04TD3944E:227a-40: ba spu mngon sgrub bsod nams de dag tshogs //
T04TD3944E:227a-41: brgya 'gyur dag tu bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis //
T04TD3944E:227b-0: dpe byad bzar gcig @227b 'grub cing de bzhin du //
T04TD3944E:227b-1: dpe byad bzang po'i lhag ma kun 'grub cing //
T04TD3944E:227b-2: dpe byad bzang pos bsdus pa'i bsod nams tshogs //
T04TD3944E:227b-3: de snyed stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis //
T04TD3944E:227b-4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par sangs rgyas tshe //
T04TD3944E:227b-5: mtshan ni sna tshogs re re 'grub 'gyur la //
T04TD3944E:227b-6: mtshan rab bskyed pa'i bsod nams rgyur gyur te //
T04TD3944E:227b-7: stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams phung po las //
T04TD3944E:227b-8: zla ba nya ltar mdzes shing gsal ba yi //
T04TD3944E:227b-9: mdzod spu mdog bzang yid 'ong 'grub 'gyur ba //
T04TD3944E:227b-10: mdzod spu mngon sgrub bsod nams de snyed tshogs //
T04TD3944E:227b-11: brgyar 'gyur stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis //
T04TD3944E:227b-12: spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba'i mtshan ldan pa'i //
T04TD3944E:227b-13: gtsug tor rgyan mdzes sangs rgyas dbu 'grub ste //
T04TD3944E:227b-14: de 'dra'i bsod nams sgrub tshul de dag kyang //
T04TD3944E:227b-15: bdag gis bsgrub ces byang chub sems mthong na //
T04TD3944E:227b-16: brtson 'grus 'dor ba de la gang gi sgor //
T04TD3944E:227b-17: sgyid lug le lo'i cha shas skabs su 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:227b-18: 'jig rten khams kun sems can ma lus par //
T04TD3944E:227b-19: rang rgyal rnams dang thams cad 'drar gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:227b-20: bzod la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig / ye shes dam pas de dag kun pas 'phags //
T04TD3944E:227b-21: de snyed bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa bas //
T04TD3944E:227b-22: mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'phags te //
T04TD3944E:227b-23: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das pa yi //
T04TD3944E:227b-24: dge la bsgrub pa de ni ngal mi shes //
T04TD3944E:227b-25: mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' de snyed pas //
T04TD3944E:227b-26: skye ba gcig thogs rgyal sras de 'phags te //
T04TD3944E:227b-27: brtson 'grus brtan dang ldan pa'i nang na yang //
T04TD3944E:227b-28: byang chub shing drung phyin pa ci zhig smos //
T04TD3944E:227b-29: rnam pa de 'dra'i ye shes rnam dag dang //
T04TD3944E:227b-30: 'jig rten ma lus sems can kun ldan yang //
T04TD3944E:227b-31: byang chub snying po'i shing drung phyin gyur la //
T04TD3944E:227b-32: bdud 'dul skye ba tha ma'i char mi 'gro //
T04TD3944E:227b-33: de 'dra'i ye shes rnam pa dag ldan pas //
T04TD3944E:227b-34: 'jig rten ma lus khams kun gang gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:227b-35: yon tan rnam mang de dag gcig sogs pas //
T04TD3944E:227b-36: bde gshegs stobs kyi cha la'ang mnyam mi 'gro //
T04TD3944E:227b-37: de 'dra'i ye shes rgya mtsho rmad byung ba //
T04TD3944E:227b-38: gzhan sems shes pa'i mthu la thogs med cing //
T04TD3944E:228a-0: @228a * // ye shes snang ba mkha' ltar yangs pa la //
T04TD3944E:228a-1: snying rje ldan pa gcig pu pha rol rgal //
T04TD3944E:228a-2: sems can ma lus kun la khyab pa yi //
T04TD3944E:228a-3: snying rje chen po 'jig rten kun du 'byung //
T04TD3944E:228a-4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rnam pa dag / rmad byung ma lus de phyir yang dag grub //
T04TD3944E:228a-5: de 'dra'i sems can dma' bas mnyan dga' ba'i //
T04TD3944E:228a-6: yang dag blang ba'i yon tan kun ldan na //
T04TD3944E:228a-7: yang dag nyid lam yan lag brgyad ldan zhing //
T04TD3944E:228a-8: brtson 'grus phul byung shin tu rnam par mdzes //
T04TD3944E:228a-9: brtson 'grus rnam gsum dge ba sbyor ba ste //
T04TD3944E:228a-10: lus dang ngag yid brtson 'grus rnam pa las //
T04TD3944E:228a-11: 'jug dang gnas dang mnyam par bzhag pa yi //
T04TD3944E:228a-12: brtson 'grus phul byung yid las byung ba yin //
T04TD3944E:228a-13: byang chub sems la mos shing zhi ba dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-14: snying rje che dang bdag med bzod pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-15: 'gro ba sdug bsngal bsdu ba rnam bzhi dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-16: chos rnams kun la yongs su 'dzin med dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-17: 'khor ba'i 'dam na yongs su skyo med dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-18: khams gsum thams cad nye bar mi dmigs shing //
T04TD3944E:228a-19: bdog pa kun gtong nga rgyal 'gyur med dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-20: bslab pa kun la yang dag slob pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-21: gzhan gyi gnod pas mi 'gyur brtan ldan zhing //
T04TD3944E:228a-22: sems la rnam 'khrug nam yang mi 'byung dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-23: dge ba'i las la brtson pa brtan pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-24: dpen la dga' ba'i ro gcig sems ldan dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-25: bsam gtan bzhi por mnyam par gzhog pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-26: bdag med nges par rtogs pa'i sems ldan dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-27: thos pa mang pos ngom par mi 'gyur zhing //
T04TD3944E:228a-28: rigs par 'jug cing de la rtog pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-29: ji ltar thob pa yang dag ston byed cing //
T04TD3944E:228a-30: brjod med chos nyid yang dag shes pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-31: mngon shes lnga la mthu chen ldan pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-32: mngon shes drug la sgom tsam byed pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-33: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon par sgrub pa dang ;
T04TD3944E:228a-34: / spyod pa tshegs med shin tu gsal ba dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-35: yang dag spong la sbyor ba byed pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-36: dge dang mi dge'i phyogs las rnam grol zhing //
T04TD3944E:228a-37: dbang po nges par bya la mkhas pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228a-38: chos rnams dbang po med par shes gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:228b-0: las kyi tshogs rnams yongs su @228b tshol byed kyang //
T04TD3944E:228b-1: gar yang 'gro med rmad byung zab pa dang //
T04TD3944E:228b-2: de la sogs pa sems spangs brtson pa'i lus //
T04TD3944E:228b-3: gzud cing dgod pa'i khyad par 'phags pa can //
T04TD3944E:228b-4: de nyid mi zad yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:228b-5: dgon pa'i brtson 'grus khyad par rgyu yang yin //
T04TD3944E:228b-6: ye shes mchog gi las la gnas 'cha' yang //
T04TD3944E:228b-7: mtshan ma'i las la de ni 'jug pa med //
T04TD3944E:228b-8: snying rje chen pos 'dus byas mi gtong zhing //
T04TD3944E:228b-9: brtson 'grus che yang 'dus byas med mi ltung //
T04TD3944E:228b-10: sngon chad ma thos chos thos gnod pa med //
T04TD3944E:228b-11: cis kyang mi tshugs thos pa'i chos kyang 'dzin /
T04TD3944E:228b-12: mi min kun kyang de la phan par dga' //
T04TD3944E:228b-13: ting 'dzin rnam pa kun kyang thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:228b-14: nyin mtshan dus rnams 'bras bu yod par zla //
T04TD3944E:228b-15: yon tan tshogs kyis dma' bar 'gyur ba med //
T04TD3944E:228b-16: mi yi chos las 'phags pa'i don rnams kyis //
T04TD3944E:228b-17: me tog autpala bzhin rnam par 'phel ;
T04TD3944E:228b-18: / grags pa yang dang bde ba thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:228b-19: ser sna dogs spangs yid tshul mchog kyang 'thob //
T04TD3944E:228b-20: tshe 'di'i yon tan ji snyed snang ba kun //
T04TD3944E:228b-21: brtson pa'i tshul 'byung yon tan che ba med //
T04TD3944E:228b-22: yon tan che mnga' rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te //
T04TD3944E:228b-23: khams gsum mchod 'os nyid kyang de las grub //
T04TD3944E:228b-24: brtson 'grus chen po'i yon tan de 'dra na //
T04TD3944E:228b-25: brtson 'grus che la gang zhing brtson mi byed //
T04TD3944E:228b-26: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o /
T04TD3944E:228b-28: // / de nas ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:228b-29: bsam gtan tshul la brtson par bya //
T04TD3944E:228b-30: 'jig rten phan pa'i rnam pa dag / ye shes snang bas bde bar 'grub //
T04TD3944E:228b-31: bsam gtan tshul gyis sems dag na //
T04TD3944E:228b-32: ston gyi dus kyi sprin bsal ba'i //
T04TD3944E:228b-33: mkha' la zla ba gsal ba ltar //
T04TD3944E:228b-34: ye shes khyad du dang bar 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:228b-35: rnam dag tshul khrims ldan byas shing //
T04TD3944E:228b-36: dge phan grogs dang brten byas te //
T04TD3944E:228b-37: bya ba nyung zhing zhi ba'i dang //
T04TD3944E:228b-38: dran pas byin rlabs tshul bcang ste //
T04TD3944E:228b-39: shing drung brtul zhugs gnas dag gam //
T04TD3944E:228b-40: ne'u gsing sdug gu'i sa gzhi'am //
T04TD3944E:228b-41: ched du ma byas mdangs dga' ba'i //
T04TD3944E:228b-42: nags kyi me tog dri zhim pa'am //
T04TD3944E:228b-43: bsam gtan rkyen du 'os pa yi //
T04TD3944E:229a-3: zab mor gnas pa'i gnas dag gam //
T04TD3944E:229a-4: dgon pa'i sa gzhi bzang po'am //
T04TD3944E:229a-5: stong pa'i gnas dang khyim dag gam //
T04TD3944E:229a-6: sman ljongs ri khrod dben pa dag / seng ge'i nga ro grags gnas sam //
T04TD3944E:229a-8: gang yang rung ba'i gnas dag tu //
T04TD3944E:229a-9: skyil mo krung du bder 'dug ste //
T04TD3944E:229a-10: drang po'i lus ni bsrang byas shing //
T04TD3944E:229a-11: drang ba'i bsrung ba sems gzhi la //
T04TD3944E:229a-12: nye bar yang dag gzhag bya ste //
T04TD3944E:229a-13: snying rjes log par rtogs pa rnams //
T04TD3944E:229a-14: skabs med tshul du dam bcas shing //
T04TD3944E:229a-15: shes phar rab shes bya ba'i dus //
T04TD3944E:229a-17: sems can mya ngan ma 'das su //
T04TD3944E:229a-18: mya ngan 'da' bar mos med ces //
T04TD3944E:229a-19: de ltar 'jig rten phan bsams te //
T04TD3944E:229a-20: sangs rgyas nyid du mos bskyed cing //
T04TD3944E:229a-22: bsam gtan bsgrub la brtson par bya //
T04TD3944E:229a-23: yang dang yang zhing ngal bso na //
T04TD3944E:229a-24: gtsubs pas me phyin me 'gyur te //
T04TD3944E:229a-25: rnal 'byor tshul la'ang de bzhin du //
T04TD3944E:229a-26: khyad par ma thob gtong mi bya //
T04TD3944E:229a-27: dmigs pa gcig la brtan tshul du //
T04TD3944E:229a-28: yid kyi bsam pa brtan par bya //
T04TD3944E:229a-29: dmigs pa mang po brgyud pa las //
T04TD3944E:229a-31: lhag mthong brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthus //
T04TD3944E:229a-32: zhum par gyur na gzengs yang bstod //
T04TD3944E:229a-33: rgod par gang tshe gyur pa'i yid //
T04TD3944E:229a-34: zhi gnas tshul gyis bzlog par bya //
T04TD3944E:229a-35: ting 'dzin mthu ni mi g-yo zhing //
T04TD3944E:229a-36: yang dag gyur na btang snyoms gzhag / bde gshegs ting 'dzin thob bya'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:229a-37: de la chags par yong mi bya //
T04TD3944E:229a-38: bsam gtan dga' ba'i ro myang bas //
T04TD3944E:229a-39: rang dbang med pa'i nyam mi blang //
T04TD3944E:229a-40: bdag gi bde tsam thob don du //
T04TD3944E:229a-41: brtsam pa rgya chen 'di sgrub min //
T04TD3944E:229a-42: lus dang srog la lta ba yi //
T04TD3944E:229a-43: zhum pas non gyur sems gyur cing ;
T04TD3944E:229a-44: / rang gi mgo bo tshig gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:229a-45: brtson 'grus lhod par des mi bya //
T04TD3944E:229a-46: mtshan ma'i rnam pa shes byas shing //
T04TD3944E:229a-47: yid ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir //
T04TD3944E:229a-48: dmigs las bsam pa nyams gyur na //
T04TD3944E:229a-49: dran pas phyir yang bsdu bar bya //
T04TD3944E:229a-50: sgrib pa rnams las rang gi yid //
T04TD3944E:229b-0: glang @229b po rang dbang thob 'gyur na //
T04TD3944E:229b-1: lcags kyus bzlog par bya ba bzhin //
T04TD3944E:229b-2: log pa'i phyogs las bzlog par bya //
T04TD3944E:229b-3: de nas sgrib pa'i nad kyi rnams //
T04TD3944E:229b-4: bsal bas sos pa'i yid gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:229b-5: dbul po nyam thag phongs pa las //
T04TD3944E:229b-6: longs spyod skyid thob thar pa bzhin //
T04TD3944E:229b-7: bde dang ldan pa'i yid kyis ni //
T04TD3944E:229b-8: 'dod pa'i skyon rnams bsal bar bya //
T04TD3944E:229b-9: de dang bral bas dmigs pa yi //
T04TD3944E:229b-10: bde ba gcig nas gcig brgyud kyang //
T04TD3944E:229b-11: glog ltar mi rtag 'gyur ba dang //
T04TD3944E:229b-12: dbu ba gsog ltar bdag med pa'i //
T04TD3944E:229b-13: rmi lam bzhin du don med par //
T04TD3944E:229b-15: pha rnams bu la byams pa dang //
T04TD3944E:229b-16: bu rnams pha la de bzhin te //
T04TD3944E:229b-17: mdza' la mdza' bo byams pa dang //
T04TD3944E:229b-18: 'gro rnams phan tshun byams pa dag / yon tan tshogs kyis bsgrub byas shing //
T04TD3944E:229b-19: brtan pa'i snying pos brtan byas te //
T04TD3944E:229b-20: g-yul du gru gdong 'dren bzhin gyi //
T04TD3944E:229b-21: mdza' byams sa mtshams 'jigs byed kyang //
T04TD3944E:229b-22: 'di tshe brtsal ba'i sdug bsngal dang //
T04TD3944E:229b-23: gzhan du ngan 'gro skyed byed pa'i //
T04TD3944E:229b-24: rgyur gyur 'dod pa'i rnam pa yin //
T04TD3944E:229b-25: de bas 'dod pa bsten mi bya //
T04TD3944E:229b-26: rnam rtog rnams kyi gzhir gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:229b-27: bdag dang gzhan rnams kun gyi yang //
T04TD3944E:229b-28: shes rab mig ldongs byed pa'i rgyu //
T04TD3944E:229b-29: mi bde sna tshogs skyed pa yang //
T04TD3944E:229b-30: bdag 'dod don la brtson par bya //
T04TD3944E:229b-31: rnam pa kun du yongs spangs pa'i //
T04TD3944E:229b-32: 'dod pa de dag gzhan don la //
T04TD3944E:229b-33: brtson pas dran byar 'os pa min //
T04TD3944E:229b-34: 'dod pa de dag thob pa dang //
T04TD3944E:229b-35: nyin gcig bzhin du bsten pa dang//
T04TD3944E:229b-36: mang du bsags pas mi ngoms na //
T04TD3944E:229b-37: de las nad chen gang zhig yod //
T04TD3944E:229b-38: btsal tshe ro med nyon mongs la //
T04TD3944E:229b-39: bsrung tshe 'jigs pa skyed byed cing //
T04TD3944E:229b-40: med 'gyur mya ngan che bskyed na //
T04TD3944E:229b-41: de la 'dod byed su zhig yod //
T04TD3944E:229b-42: gang gi ro la myos gyur na //
T04TD3944E:229b-43: rang don nyid kyang mi rigs te //
T04TD3944E:229b-44: myos 'gyur smyon chu ji bzhin pa'i //
T04TD3944E:229b-45: 'dod pa sems ldan su zhig bskyed //
T04TD3944E:229b-46: de ltar rnam pa thams cad du //
T04TD3944E:229b-47: 'dod pa skyon ldan shes gyur na //
T04TD3944E:229b-48: de las sems ni ldog 'gyur te //
T04TD3944E:229b-50: dben las skyes pa'i dga' dang bde //
T04TD3944E:229b-51: bag yangs thob las skyes pa 'byung//
T04TD3944E:230a-0: @230a * // yan lag de dang ldan pas na //
T04TD3944E:230a-1: bsam gtan dang po thob pa yin //
T04TD3944E:230a-2: der ni rnam rtog rnam dpyod dag /'dod ldan skyon ldan mthong 'gyur zhing //
T04TD3944E:230a-3: de dag zhi ba tshol byed pas //
T04TD3944E:230a-4: ting 'dzin dga' skyes bde ba thob //
T04TD3944E:230a-5: nang ni yongs su dang gyur zhing //
T04TD3944E:230a-6: de sems rtse gcig gyur pa ni //
T04TD3944E:230a-7: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bsam gtan zhes //
T04TD3944E:230a-8: gnyis med drang srong mchog gis gsungs //
T04TD3944E:230a-9: yid kyi 'khrug long yin shes nas //
T04TD3944E:230a-10: dga' las 'dod chags bral gyur pa //
T04TD3944E:230a-11: dran pa btang snyoms ldan pa yi //
T04TD3944E:230a-12: bsam gtan gsum pa thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:230a-13: bde ba'i bsam pa yongs btang bas //
T04TD3944E:230a-14: bde dang sdug bsngal med gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:230a-15: btang snyoms dran pas rnam dag pa'i //
T04TD3944E:230a-17: de nas mngon shes lnga thob ste //
T04TD3944E:230a-18: chos rgyal rgyal srid gnas pa na //
T04TD3944E:230a-19: dpal ldan grags pa khrel dang gzungs //
T04TD3944E:230a-21: gzhan gyi don du mngon bsgrubs pas //
T04TD3944E:230a-22: rang rgyal nyan thos yon tan la //
T04TD3944E:230a-23: de dag shin tu 'das gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:230a-24: shin tu khyad 'phags mthu dang ldan //
T04TD3944E:230a-26: tshul khrims med pa tshul la 'god //
T04TD3944E:230a-27: khro ba bzod cing nges pa dang //
T04TD3944E:230a-28: sgyid lug brtson 'grus chen po dang //
T04TD3944E:230a-29: 'khrug pa'i sems ldan bsam gtan dang //
T04TD3944E:230a-30: shes rab 'chal pa shes rab la //
T04TD3944E:230a-31: snying rje chen po skyo med par //
T04TD3944E:230a-32: brtson 'grus spyod pas sbyor ba byed //
T04TD3944E:230a-33: de nas mtha' yas spyod yul can //
T04TD3944E:230a-34: nyi ma 'od chen ji bzhin du //
T04TD3944E:230a-35: mi nyams gsal ba'i 'od chen gyis //
T04TD3944E:230a-36: 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byed //
T04TD3944E:230a-37: de nas sems can sdig can dag / ngan 'gror ltung bar gyur pa dang //
T04TD3944E:230a-38: bsod nams tshe dag zad gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:230a-39: lha las ltung bar gyur pa dang //
T04TD3944E:230a-40: 'jig rten sdug bsngal de dang des //
T04TD3944E:230a-41: yongs su gdung bar gyur pa dag /'jig rten khams na gang yod pa //
T04TD3944E:230a-42: lha mig gsal bas mthong gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:230a-43: snying rje chen po skye 'gyur te //
T04TD3944E:230a-44: snying rje ldan pas bag med spong //
T04TD3944E:230a-45: gzhan don sgrub la bag yod pas //
T04TD3944E:230a-46: bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dang ldan //
T04TD3944E:230a-47: de nas 'jig rten khams mang na //
T04TD3944E:230b-0: @230b de bzhin gshegs pa mang bzhugs dang //
T04TD3944E:230b-1: sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyan dag dang //
T04TD3944E:230b-2: dge 'dun phun sum tshogs mthong zhes //
T04TD3944E:230b-3: byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog gi / rnam dag spyod yul spyod mthong ste //
T04TD3944E:230b-4: sems can gzhan la phan don du //
T04TD3944E:230b-5: dpal ldan spyod pa mthong gyur pas //
T04TD3944E:230b-6: de la smon lam che skyed cing //
T04TD3944E:230b-8: gzhan don rgya chen sngo byed pas //
T04TD3944E:230b-9: rgyal sras tshul mchog yongs su 'grub //
T04TD3944E:230b-10: mi las 'das pa'i rna ba sta //
T04TD3944E:230b-11: lha yi rna ba rnam dag pas //
T04TD3944E:230b-12: rgyang ring sgra rnams nye ba bzhin //
T04TD3944E:230b-13: che chung rnam pa kun thos shing //
T04TD3944E:230b-14: snying brtse med pas gang smras pa'i //
T04TD3944E:230b-15: zhe gcod ro med tshig gi rnams //
T04TD3944E:230b-16: khro ba'i me las byung ba yi //
T04TD3944E:230b-18: lha mo'i glu ru snyan pa dang //
T04TD3944E:230b-19: rgyan gyi phar phur sil khrol dang //
T04TD3944E:230b-20: lha rdzas rol mo'i sgra snyan pas //
T04TD3944E:230b-21: mi rtag tshul thos sgra thos shing //
T04TD3944E:230b-22: 'jigs dang sdug bsngal rnam pa las //
T04TD3944E:230b-23: mi bzad mya ngan drag po'i sgra //
T04TD3944E:230b-24: nyon mongs nyams bab thos pa dag / mi dga'i rnam pa thos gyur na //
T04TD3944E:230b-25: skul ma drag pos bskul ba bzhin //
T04TD3944E:230b-26: byang chub sems dpa' mthu ldan zhing //
T04TD3944E:230b-27: khong nas snying rje che ldan te //
T04TD3944E:230b-28: brtson 'grus mchog ni rtsom par byed //
T04TD3944E:230b-30: bde gshegs rnams las chos thos te //
T04TD3944E:230b-31: mya ngan 'das la mos pa'i blos //
T04TD3944E:230b-32: sems can don mang sgrub par byed //
T04TD3944E:230b-33: gzhan sems tshul la de mkhas shing //
T04TD3944E:230b-34: bag la nyal dang bsam shes pas //
T04TD3944E:230b-35: ye shes yo byad ldan pa de //
T04TD3944E:230b-36: bsod nams myu gu gsar yang bskyed //
T04TD3944E:230b-37: bskal pa bye ba mang po yi //
T04TD3944E:230b-38: sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes dran zhing //
T04TD3944E:230b-39: 'jig rten bsod nams rnam pa dang //
T04TD3944E:230b-40: stobs dang stobs med mthong gyur nas //
T04TD3944E:230b-41: de dag bsam pa'i tshul bzhin du //
T04TD3944E:230b-42: rdzu 'phrul rnam pas lus bsgyur cing //
T04TD3944E:230b-43: snod bzhin ston par byed pas na //
T04TD3944E:230b-44: don yod rjod byed mchog tu 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:230b-45: la lar gzugs mdzes yun ldan zhing //
T04TD3944E:230b-46: nyi ma brgya lta'i 'od ldan te //
T04TD3944E:230b-47: ri mo gsal ba'i mtshan rgyas pa //
T04TD3944E:230b-48: thub rgyal mtshan ldan sku mchog gis //
T04TD3944E:230b-49: 'gro ba'i mig la bde skyid cing //
T04TD3944E:230b-50: yid la khyab par sim byed pas//
T04TD3944E:231a-0: @231a * // rgyal dbang mos pa byang chub tu //
T04TD3944E:231a-1: bsgrub phyir 'chi med ston par byed //
T04TD3944E:231a-2: thub dbang zhi tshul dpal ldan pa'i //
T04TD3944E:231a-3: spyod pa rnam par spyod byed cing //
T04TD3944E:231a-4: la lar 'dul dbang ji bzhin du //
T04TD3944E:231a-5: slob ma'i tshul gyis 'dul bar byed //
T04TD3944E:231a-6: la lar lha dbang brgya byin bzhin //
T04TD3944E:231a-7: lha yi spyi bo zhabs la thug / nor sbyin ji bzhin nor mang gtong //
T04TD3944E:231a-8: la lar tshangs ltar gzugs mchog 'dzin //
T04TD3944E:231a-9: la lar spyan gsum phye ba ste //
T04TD3944E:231a-10: dri med zla ba'i rgyan ldan ston //
T04TD3944E:231a-11: la lar lha mi'i rgyal po dang //
T04TD3944E:231a-12: klu yi dpal chen khyer ba ston //
T04TD3944E:231a-13: la lar gnod sbyin rgyal po ltar //
T04TD3944E:231a-14: rdo rje 'bar ba thogs pa ston //
T04TD3944E:231a-15: yon tan 'od ldan thub zla ltar //
T04TD3944E:231a-16: la lar g-yang gzhi mtshan bstan ston //
T04TD3944E:231a-17: la lar brgya byin nor bu yis //
T04TD3944E:231a-19: la lar chu yi lha gzugs dang //
T04TD3944E:231a-20: la lar 'dod pa'i lha ltar ston //
T04TD3944E:231a-21: la lar bud med gzugs mdzes dang //
T04TD3944E:231a-22: la lar pho smos dga' ba ston //
T04TD3944E:231a-23: la lar brtul zhugs nor ldan te //
T04TD3944E:231a-25: la lar mi rnams yid 'phrog cing //
T04TD3944E:231a-26: slob dpon slob ma rgyal po byed //
T04TD3944E:231a-27: la lar mthu chen byin rlabs kyis //
T04TD3944E:231a-28: ngan song sdug bsngal rnam mang sel //
T04TD3944E:231a-29: 'gro ba'i dad pa tshul bzhin du //
T04TD3944E:231a-30: sna tshogs spyod pa las bstan zhing //
T04TD3944E:231a-31: snying rje'i yon tan rgya che bas //
T04TD3944E:231a-32: 'jig rten phan pa grangs med byed //
T04TD3944E:231a-34: khyad par phun sum tshogs thob pas //
T04TD3944E:231a-35: gter gyi mtshan ma slu med bzhin //
T04TD3944E:231a-36: khyad par gong nas gong brtson bya //
T04TD3944E:231a-37: de la gnas 'cha' yan bor cing //
T04TD3944E:231a-38: brtul zhugs lhod pa'i tshul bor te //
T04TD3944E:231a-39: dge ba spel phyir brtson par bya //
T04TD3944E:231a-40: de las bzlog pa dman par 'gro //
T04TD3944E:231a-41: ting 'dzin rtsom pa med pa ste //
T04TD3944E:231a-42: rjes su bsgrub pa dkon pas na //
T04TD3944E:231a-43: rnam par rgyal ba 'dod rnams kyis //
T04TD3944E:231a-44: zhi ba'i gnyen po tshugs med bsten //
T04TD3944E:231a-45: yid tshul spang ba'i mchog gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:231a-46: sa ltar mi g-yo brtan pa yi //
T04TD3944E:231a-47: sa mchog mi g-yo ma thob tu //
T04TD3944E:231a-48: de la yid brtan g-yo mi bya //
T04TD3944E:231a-49: mngon par 'dus byas lam byas pa //
T04TD3944E:231a-51: de bas rnam rtog rnam spangs te //
T04TD3944E:231b-0: @231b lam gyi dam pa bsgom par bya //
T04TD3944E:231b-1: bde gtsang rtag pa'i rnam rtog dag /'dus byas slu ba'i chos can du //
T04TD3944E:231b-2: yang dag rtogs par shes bya ste //
T04TD3944E:231b-3: dngos po'i rnam rtog yongs su spang //
T04TD3944E:231b-4: dmigs pa chung yang byung gyur na //
T04TD3944E:231b-5: nyon mongs mdas gtsag gzhir yang 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:231b-6: de 'dra'i gnod pa kun bcil na //
T04TD3944E:231b-8: gnas pa'i skyon dang ldan gyur na //
T04TD3944E:231b-9: bsam gtan rnam dag tshul mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:231b-10: gnas pa'i rjes 'brangs nyams pa ste //
T04TD3944E:231b-11: dong skam bcas zhes de phyir brjod //
T04TD3944E:231b-12: tha snyad tshul dag 'grub don du //
T04TD3944E:231b-13: de ni 'jig rten lam zhes bya //
T04TD3944E:231b-14: yod dang med byung gtang med pas //
T04TD3944E:231b-15: gang na'ang ci yang skye ba med //
T04TD3944E:231b-16: nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra yid ldan na //
T04TD3944E:231b-17: srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang bral //
T04TD3944E:231b-18: tshul 'chos bral ba'i spyod brtan la //
T04TD3944E:231b-19: kha gsag med pa'i tshul ldan na //
T04TD3944E:231b-20: 'jig rten spyod pa de byed kyang //
T04TD3944E:231b-21: 'gro ba gcig tu phan pa spyod //
T04TD3944E:231b-22: sems la dbang gyur thob pas na //
T04TD3944E:231b-23: ting 'dzin stobs las nyams pa med //
T04TD3944E:231b-24: de thob yan chad rmad byung ba'i //
T04TD3944E:231b-26: dbyar dus rgya mtsho chu klung dag / chu gsar byung bas skye zhing 'phel //
T04TD3944E:231b-27: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o /
T04TD3944E:231b-29: // / sbyin la sogs pa'i bsod nams 'di dag ni //
T04TD3944E:231b-30: shes rab mgon bcas lhag par mthu ldan 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:231b-31: gser gyi rgyan bzangs rnam pa sna tshogs la //
T04TD3944E:231b-32: rin chen phra bkod 'od kyis gsal ba bzhin //
T04TD3944E:231b-33: so so'i don la de dag yon tan mthu //
T04TD3944E:231b-34: shes rab 'di nyid rgya chen sgrub par byed //
T04TD3944E:231b-35: dbang po rang rang yul gyi bye brag la //
T04TD3944E:231b-36: mthu zhen yid kyis gsal bar bstan pa bzhin //
T04TD3944E:231b-37: lus 'di srog dang bral na mthu med cing //
T04TD3944E:231b-38: rang gi dgos pa bsgrub pa mi mdzes pa //
T04TD3944E:231b-39: de bzhin shes rab med pas blo gyur na //
T04TD3944E:231b-40: don sgrub 'jig rten dag na mdzes pa med //
T04TD3944E:231b-41: dad la sogs pa'i dbang po'i rnam pa yang //
T04TD3944E:231b-42: dbang po gzhan la blo 'dzin shes rab gtso //
T04TD3944E:231b-43: de yi mgon ldan yon tan skyon shes pas //
T04TD3944E:231b-44: nyon mongs zad pa'i tshul la mkhas par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:231b-45: shes rab med na 'bras bu don gnyer la //
T04TD3944E:232a-2: gzhan don btang ba sbyin pa'i mchog ces gsungs //
T04TD3944E:232a-3: lhag ma nor spel don gyi sbyor ba yin //
T04TD3944E:232a-4: shes rab mi gsal rnam par bying gyur na //
T04TD3944E:232a-5: byang chub sems dpas rang gi sha byin na //
T04TD3944E:232a-6: sman gyi shing ltar rnam par mi rtog par //
T04TD3944E:232a-7: mtho'am dma' bar 'gyur ba de la med //
T04TD3944E:232a-8: de bas 'jig rten 'das pa don gyi gzhi //
T04TD3944E:232a-9: khro med dga' bas phun sum tshogs pa'i sems //
T04TD3944E:232a-10: sbyin pa chen pos 'gro don bsgrub mos pa //
T04TD3944E:232a-11: rgyal sras sa yi dang po 'thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:232a-12: de la gnas pa phal cher byang chub tu //
T04TD3944E:232a-14: shes rab mthus bstan lam mchog bde ba des //
T04TD3944E:232a-15: rim gyis dri med rgyal sras sa yang thob //
T04TD3944E:232a-16: de nas rang bzhin rnam dag tshul 'chang zhing //
T04TD3944E:232a-17: gling bzhi 'khor los sgyur bar de 'gyur te //
T04TD3944E:232a-18: rgyal po kun gyi spyi bos bka' blang zhing //
T04TD3944E:232a-19: thub dbang rgyal ba bzhin du mchod par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:232a-20: de dag yan chad 'dod pa'i lha ris dang //
T04TD3944E:232a-21: 'jig rten byur bu stong gnyis stong gsum gyi //
T04TD3944E:232a-22: dbang phyug thob 'gyur de dag yan chad du //
T04TD3944E:232a-23: shes rab 'od kyis rgyu rnams sbyangs pas 'thob //
T04TD3944E:232a-24: shes rab snang bas mun pa ma bsal na //
T04TD3944E:232a-25: tshul khrims dag dang ldan par de mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:232a-26: phal cher shes rab med pas tshul khrims dag / shes pa'i skyon gyis nyon mongs rnyog bcas 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:232a-27: rang gi don du tshul khrims mi bsgrub na //
T04TD3944E:232a-28: blo ldan srid pa'i btson ra'i skyon mthong zhing //
T04TD3944E:232a-29: de nas 'jig rten ma lus gdon mos pa //
T04TD3944E:232a-30: srid pa'i don du mi sgrub smos ci dgos //
T04TD3944E:232a-31: shes rab log pa'i skyon gyis sems rnyog na //
T04TD3944E:232a-32: bzod pa'i yon tan de la gnas ci smos //
T04TD3944E:232a-33: legs par rtogs la mi dga'i tshul 'chang zhing //
T04TD3944E:232a-34: yon tan med pa'i rgyan la grags pa bzhin //
T04TD3944E:232a-35: shes rab ldan pa rnams la gnod pa dag / bzod pa'i yon tan yod pas gnod mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:232a-36: shin tu dul ba'i glang po mchog rnams la //
T04TD3944E:232a-37: las kyi khyad par rnam mang bzod pa bzhin //
T04TD3944E:232a-38: brtson 'grus gcig pu byas pa ngal ba'i mtha' //
T04TD3944E:232a-39: shes rab grogs kyis bstangs na don chen 'grub //
T04TD3944E:232a-40: bsgrubs byas rjes la de yi yon tan 'thob //
T04TD3944E:232b-0: de las byung @232b ba'i dub pa yongs su sel //
T04TD3944E:232b-1: mkhas pa rnams la phul du bsngags 'gyur zhing //
T04TD3944E:232b-2: de las phra zhing zab pa gzhan med pas //
T04TD3944E:232b-3: 'dod pa'i skyon gyis yongs su ma bsgribs pa'i //
T04TD3944E:232b-4: yid lam drang por shes rab med mi 'gyur //
