T04TD3944E:232b-5: de 'dra'i bsam gtan bde dga' mchog ldan pa //
T04TD3944E:232b-6: skyon bsags nyes pa chen po grags gyur pa'i //
T04TD3944E:232b-7: lam gol rigs pa'i tshul las brten pa ni //
T04TD3944E:232b-8: skye bo ma rabs yid la ji ltar 'grub //
T04TD3944E:232b-9: shes rab tshul la brtson med blo 'chang na //
T04TD3944E:232b-10: de yi lta ba yongs su dag mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:232b-11: de med tshul khrims mi 'dag de med pas //
T04TD3944E:232b-12: ting 'dzin mi 'thob sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:232b-13: shes rab ldan pas skyon las bag byed cing //
T04TD3944E:232b-14: yon tan tshogs las rgyun du bde thob pas //
T04TD3944E:232b-15: nyon mongs 'gro ba'i don la rab brtson zhing //
T04TD3944E:232b-16: yon tan tshogs kyi bde ba'i lam du 'jug / yang dag rtogs pas ting 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:232b-17: ngag yid lus rnams rnam par dag pa 'grub //
T04TD3944E:232b-18: de phyir skyon med mthu dang ldan gyur pa //
T04TD3944E:232b-19: 'jig rten phan pa phun sum tshogs la 'jug / sbyin pas ci 'dod yid bzhin sgrub pa byed //
T04TD3944E:232b-20: tshig snyan bdud rtsi shin tu gsal ba dang //
T04TD3944E:232b-21: rgyu med mthu dang ldan pa'i sdom pa yis //
T04TD3944E:232b-22: gzhan gyi don la mnyam par kun du spyod //
T04TD3944E:232b-23: don la thun mong yang dag bstan byas shing //
T04TD3944E:232b-24: byams pas de dag yid ni dbang bskur te //
T04TD3944E:232b-25: shes rab stobs kyis 'khor lo thogs med de //
T04TD3944E:232b-26: mya ngan 'das ba'i bde la 'god par byed //
T04TD3944E:232b-27: shes rab sngon 'gro mthu chen 'di dag gis //
T04TD3944E:232b-28: byin gyis brlabs shing yongs su bsrungs pas na //
T04TD3944E:232b-29: mtsho med ngan 'gro 'chi dang smad pa dang //
T04TD3944E:232b-30: dogs pa'i stobs kyis 'jigs pa nyer mi 'ong //
T04TD3944E:232b-31: 'jigs pa thams cad skyon las byung ba ste //
T04TD3944E:232b-32: shes rab skyon dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pas //
T04TD3944E:232b-33: ston gyi nam mkha'i sprin tshogs med pa la //
T04TD3944E:232b-34: nyi 'od gsal ba mun dang mi 'grogs bzhin //
T04TD3944E:232b-35: nyi ma 'od chen shar bar gyur bzhin du //
T04TD3944E:232b-36: 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams mun nag gang 'gebs pa //
T04TD3944E:232b-37: shes rab 'od kyi mthu chen 'byung bas na //
T04TD3944E:233a-2: gang la shes rab 'od chen shar gyur pa //
T04TD3944E:233a-3: de la bya ba'i lhag ma las pa med //
T04TD3944E:233a-4: bskal pa'i mes bsregs 'jig rten gsal ba'i tshe //
T04TD3944E:233a-5: bsreg bya'i lhag ma yod par brjod med bzhin //
T04TD3944E:233a-6: snang ba thams cad gcig tu 'dus gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:233a-7: shes rab 'od la bskrun du nyer mi 'gro //
T04TD3944E:233a-8: de bas khe chen de las mchog gzhan med //
T04TD3944E:233a-9: yongs su mnyam pa med par 'ang gzhan med do //
T04TD3944E:233a-10: shes rab tshul brtson bslab pa bde tshul du //
T04TD3944E:233a-11: yongs su rdzogs 'gyur tshul khrims zhi bar 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:233a-12: de bas rang gi mthu rnams kun gtugs te //
T04TD3944E:233a-13: de 'dra'i shes rab tshul la brtson par bya //
T04TD3944E:233a-14: phung po khams dang skye mched rgyu dag dang //
T04TD3944E:233a-15: bden pa'i gnas la som nyir mi 'gyur zhing //
T04TD3944E:233a-16: dus gsum de 'drar bsdus pa'i rigs pa ni //
T04TD3944E:233a-17: shes rab shin tu sbyangs pa'i yul 'jug yin //
T04TD3944E:233a-18: shes rab dag sbyangs spyod pa'i rnam pa dag / yid ches dka' zhing yon tan snang la yang //
T04TD3944E:233a-19: skyi g-ya' ngo mtshar thob pa'i dbang gyur pas //
T04TD3944E:233a-20: rgyal sras grags pa chen pos khyab par 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:233a-21: shin tu mthu 'bar shes rab stobs kyi phul //
T04TD3944E:233a-22: bdud dang dpung bcas tshogs kyis bzod mi nus//
T04TD3944E:233a-23: shes rab 'od kyis de dag mig rmongs pas //
T04TD3944E:233a-24: de dag mgo 'degs lta bar mos pa med //
T04TD3944E:233a-25: 'dod pa'i ltas 'phangs mda' la mgo thub pa'i //
T04TD3944E:233a-26: shes rab go cha sems kyis brtan bgos na //
T04TD3944E:233a-27: gzugs la sogs pa'i dmag mang tshogs kyi rnams //
T04TD3944E:233a-28: gcig pu 'jigs med zil gyis mnan cing 'gro //
T04TD3944E:233a-29: mi brtan dang tshul 'jigs shing rtabs [?] pa'am //
T04TD3944E:233a-30: glen pa'i ngang tshul mya ngan 'dzin pa'am //
T04TD3944E:233a-31: mthu zhan sems la rtsa ba zug gyur pa'i //
T04TD3944E:233a-32: khro dang chags dang dman zil gnon pa'am //
T04TD3944E:233a-33: phan byed rnams la 'jungs pa'i dri ma dag /'dod chags ldan la rten 'cha' rgod pa'am //
T04TD3944E:233a-34: gzi brjid mthu chung le lo'i bsam pa dang //
T04TD3944E:233a-35: shin tu g-yeng bas ma zhi 'char tshul dag / so so'i rkyen gyi bsam pa thibs po la //
T04TD3944E:233a-36: gnas 'cha' nyes pa'i rnam pa de dang de //
T04TD3944E:233a-37: 'gro la phan don dam bcas shes rab can //
T04TD3944E:233b-0: shes rab chen pos ma @233b lus yongs su sel //
T04TD3944E:233b-1: skyon bral brtan zhing ngang des de mkhyen nas //
T04TD3944E:233b-2: dga' bde skyid phyir legs par de gzigs shing //
T04TD3944E:233b-3: dbang bskur bdud rtsi shin tu sim byed pas //
T04TD3944E:233b-4: thub dbang rnams kyis de ni dbang yang bskur //
T04TD3944E:233b-5: bde gshegs mdzod spu mtshan rab thon pa yi //
T04TD3944E:233b-6: 'od chen zla ba gsal bzhin sim byed pas //
T04TD3944E:233b-7: rgyal sras de yi mgo nas dbang bskur na //
T04TD3944E:233b-8: mchod sbyin me la mar khus blugs ltar mdzes //
T04TD3944E:233b-9: chos rgyal rgyal tshab thabs de thob gyur na //
T04TD3944E:233b-10: phyogs bcu kun du sprul pa'i lus bkye zhing //
T04TD3944E:233b-11: sprin chen char gyi rgyun gyis rdul bsal bzhin //
T04TD3944E:233b-12: 'jig rten sdug bsngal lhun gyis grub par sel //
T04TD3944E:233b-13: rgyal sras mthu mchog de 'dra rmad byung dag / thams cad shes rab de yi mthu las byung //
T04TD3944E:233b-14: bu la byams pa'i ma 'dra shes rab las //
T04TD3944E:233b-15: de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'byung ci mtshar gyi //
T04TD3944E:233b-16: bde gshegs stobs bcu stobs kyi phul byung ba ;
T04TD3944E:233b-17: / mtshungs med mchog tu bya ba thams cad dang //
T04TD3944E:233b-18: yon tan tshogs gzhan ma lus thams cad kyang //
T04TD3944E:233b-19: de 'dra'i shes rab rgyu la brten zhing 'byung //
T04TD3944E:233b-20: 'jig rten dag na sgyu rtsal gter mchog dang //
T04TD3944E:233b-21: gtsug lag mig 'dra ci snyed yod pa dang //
T04TD3944E:233b-22: yongs su skyob byed blo dang sngags la sogs //
T04TD3944E:233b-23: rnam bkod chos kyi khyad par tha dad dang //
T04TD3944E:233b-24: rnam grangs rnam mang rnam thar sgo dag dang //
T04TD3944E:233b-25: 'jig rten phan pa'i rnam pa de dang des //
T04TD3944E:233b-26: rgyal sras mthu chen rnam par ston byed pa //
T04TD3944E:233b-27: de dag thams cad shes rab mthu las 'byung //
T04TD3944E:233b-28: dbang po'i yul rnams lha rdzas 'dra bdog pa'i //
T04TD3944E:233b-29: rgyal srid che ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag / rang bzhin tshul min 'gyur ba med pa yang //
T04TD3944E:233b-30: shes rab yon tan blon po ldan pa'i mthus //
T04TD3944E:233b-31: gzhan la phan byed ro gcig byams pa la //
T04TD3944E:233b-32: 'dod chags 'go ba yongs su spang ba dang //
T04TD3944E:233b-33: gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod snying rje la //
T04TD3944E:233b-34: mya ngan khur gyi le los mi dma' dang //
T04TD3944E:233b-35: dga' mchog dang ldan yang dag g-yeng med dang //
T04TD3944E:233b-36: 'gro don mi g-yel btang snyoms chen po dang //
T04TD3944E:233b-37: yon tan de dang de dag gnyen po'i lam //
T04TD3944E:233b-38: shes rab chen pos bkag pas rnam par mdzes //
T04TD3944E:234a-0: bsam pa bag la nyal la @234a * //
T04TD3944E:234a-2: shes rab nyi 'od 'bar ltar de med na //
T04TD3944E:234a-3: su zhig yun ring 'jig rten rkyen 'byung ba'i //
T04TD3944E:234a-4: rang bzhin tshul gyur mun nag sel nus yod //
T04TD3944E:234a-5: brtan 'os bla ma rim gro bsnyen bkur te //
T04TD3944E:234a-6: shes rab bsgrub phyir thos pa btsal bar bya //
T04TD3944E:234a-7: rnam pa sum cu gnyis kyis shes bya ste //
T04TD3944E:234a-8: yang dag mnyam gzhag yid kyis rnam par sel //
T04TD3944E:234a-9: thos nyung dmus long bsgom pa'i tshul mi shes //
T04TD3944E:234a-10: de med des ko ci zhig bsam par bya //
T04TD3944E:234a-11: de bas thos la brtson bya de rgyu las //
T04TD3944E:234a-12: bsams bzhin bsgoms pas shes rab yangs pa 'byung //
T04TD3944E:234a-13: dri ma rtsod med sgo dang brtan pa dang //
T04TD3944E:234a-14: don tshol rtogs pa'i mthu yod rtogs pa dang //
T04TD3944E:234a-15: bsam gtan de yi yon tan skyed pa bas //
T04TD3944E:234a-16: shes rab bsgrub la mngon par brtson par bya //
T04TD3944E:234a-17: shes rab thob pa'i tshul la thabs kyi mdo //
T04TD3944E:234a-18: bsam gtan de don nges pa'i thos mang ba //
T04TD3944E:234a-19: yon tan tshogs rgyu shes rab snang ba ni //
T04TD3944E:234a-20: gnyis po de las gtsub shing me ltar 'byung //
T04TD3944E:234a-21: mkhas pa'i skye bos spyod pa'i lam bsten te //
T04TD3944E:234a-22: gti mug rgyur gyur thibs po spang bar bya //
T04TD3944E:234a-23: de bsgribs gyur na zla ba shar gyur kyang //
T04TD3944E:234a-24: char sprin cher bsgribs mi snang mtshungs mi snang //
T04TD3944E:234a-25: le lo snyom dang rten ngan brten pa dang //
T04TD3944E:234a-26: gnyid kyi dbang gyur mi rtog ngang tshul dang //
T04TD3944E:234a-27: thub pa'i ye shes mchog la mos med dang //
T04TD3944E:234a-28: log pa'i nga rgyal non pas don 'dri dang //
T04TD3944E:234a-29: dma' sems ngag la zhen pas byung ba'i rgyus //
T04TD3944E:234a-30: mkhas pa'i skya bo bsten par ma dad dang //
T04TD3944E:234a-31: log pa'i rnam rtog dus tshe log lta dag / gti mug rgyu yin de bsal gnyen po ni //
T04TD3944E:234a-32: phung po khams dang skye mched bden pa dang //
T04TD3944E:234a-33: rig pa dag dang rgyu byung tshul brtag dang //
T04TD3944E:234a-34: chos la mkhas pa'i rnam pa de dag ni //
T04TD3944E:234a-35: shes rab thabs kyi yul brgyad rnam pa yin //
T04TD3944E:234a-36: gzugs rnams dbu ba'i tshogs 'dra snying po med ;
T04TD3944E:234a-37: / tshor ba rnam gsum chu yi chu bur tshul //
T04TD3944E:234a-38: 'du shes 'dod pa'i yon tan zhugs pa ni //
T04TD3944E:234a-39: smig rgyus ri dags slu bzhin byis pa slu //
T04TD3944E:234a-40: 'du byed rnam pa chu shing rang bzhin 'dra //
T04TD3944E:234a-41: sgyu ma'i tshul las rnam shes gtad pa med //
T04TD3944E:234a-42: de la brten zhing ro 'dra'i lus 'di nyid //
T04TD3944E:234b-0: rnam mang bskyod @234b cing lam rgyud kun du 'khyam //
T04TD3944E:234b-1: bdag dang bdag gi 'di la gang yang med //
T04TD3944E:234b-2: mi gtsang sna tshogs 'dus pa'i tshogs 'di ste //
T04TD3944E:234b-3: rang dbang yod ltar 'khrul 'khor byas pa bzhin //
T04TD3944E:234b-4: sems can 'du shes byis pa slu ba byed //
T04TD3944E:234b-5: mig 'di skad cig 'jig ste bdag ma yin//
T04TD3944E:234b-6: mig ldan de min mig la bdag kyang med //
T04TD3944E:234b-7: bdag la mig med skye mched lhag ma yang //
T04TD3944E:234b-8: de dang tshul 'dra gtad med bdag gi med //
T04TD3944E:234b-9: lus la gnas pa'i khams dang phyi rol khams //
T04TD3944E:234b-10: mtshan nyid mi mtshungs 'gal ba gang yang med //
T04TD3944E:234b-11: rnam shes khams kyang mi rtag bdag ma yin ;
T04TD3944E:234b-12: / de las gzhan yang nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
T04TD3944E:234b-13: de ltar 'di ni sred rmongs yid ldan la //
T04TD3944E:234b-14: sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig byung bar gyur pa yin //
T04TD3944E:234b-15: sred dang bral na zhi ba'i mchog thob ste //
T04TD3944E:234b-16: tshul khrims ting 'dzin sred sel lam yang thob //
T04TD3944E:234b-17: de dang de dag rten 'brel byung ba zhes ;
T04TD3944E:234b-18: / lta ba rnam dag yod med gnyis mi dmigs //
T04TD3944E:234b-19: 'gro ba 'di dag de la sgyu ltar snang //
T04TD3944E:234b-20: de phyir bde la sogs pas 'gyur med bstan //
T04TD3944E:234b-21: 'das gyur byung gyur rtog pa log lta ste //
T04TD3944E:234b-22: byung gyur gang yin srid las bde 'gyur zhes //
T04TD3944E:234b-23: de ltar 'das pa'i yul la 'dod bral zhing//
T04TD3944E:234b-24: byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba smon pa med //
T04TD3944E:234b-25: sdug bsngal tshul gyis mngon par mi bde zhing //
T04TD3944E:234b-26: mi bzad mig phye mngon pa'i tshul yod na //
T04TD3944E:234b-27: de dag don bsgrub phongs dor tshul bsams shing //
T04TD3944E:234b-28: shes ldan su zhig dgar gnas sla snyam sems //
T04TD3944E:234b-29: de ltar rnam grol blo ldan snying rje can //
T04TD3944E:234b-30: 'gro ba mgon med nyon mongs gzir mthong na //
T04TD3944E:234b-31: thams cad byang chub mchog la ma bkod du //
T04TD3944E:234b-32: dma' las byams btang mya ngan 'dar mi mos //
T04TD3944E:234b-33: 'jig rten don sgrub tshul la mthu med pa'i //
T04TD3944E:234b-34: theg pa gnyis po gtan du spang byas shing //
T04TD3944E:234b-35: thub rgyal theg pa snying rjes bstan pa'i lam //
T04TD3944E:234b-36: gzhan phan ro gcig rang bzhin de dag 'jug / dma' 'os tshul la legs pa'i blo mi gzhol //
T04TD3944E:234b-37: che la che min nam yang gnas mi 'gyur //
T04TD3944E:234b-38: gtsang ma'i rang bzhin gtsang dang rtag tu 'brel //
T04TD3944E:234b-39: gzhan yang mthun dang mthun gyur chos nyid tshul //
T04TD3944E:234b-40: bde dang mi bde rmi lam 'drar 'brangs shing //
T04TD3944E:235a-0: @235a * // gti mug skyon gyis dma' ba'i 'gro mthong na //
T04TD3944E:235a-1: las kyi dam pa gzhan don dga' bor zhing //
T04TD3944E:235a-2: rang gi don la de ko ci ste brtson //
T04TD3944E:235a-3: gang zhig 'jig rten phan phyir kun spyod cing //
T04TD3944E:235a-4: mngon pa'i nga rgyal bdag lta yongs spangs te //
T04TD3944E:235a-5: kun la byams pas mi gnyis lam rgyu ba de ni mya ngan 'das kyang 'jig rten spyod //
T04TD3944E:235a-6: shes rab rnam dag mngon sgrub theg pa'i mchog / thub chen thams cad mkhyen nyid de las 'byung //
T04TD3944E:235a-7: de ni 'jig rten rnams kyi mig bzhin te //
T04TD3944E:235a-8: 'od ldan nyi ma shar ba'i 'od dang 'dra //
T04TD3944E:235a-9: 'khor ba'i skyon gyi khur gyis ngal chad kyang //
T04TD3944E:235a-10: shes rab rnam par dbye la skyon med pa //
T04TD3944E:235a-11: de ni sangs rgyas legs bsgrub theg pa la //
T04TD3944E:235a-12: bdag nyid yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba med //
T04TD3944E:235a-13: bde gshegs mthu can rmad byung mthong 'gyur bas //
T04TD3944E:235a-14: yan lag thams cad spu g-yo dga' gyur cing //
T04TD3944E:235a-15: de bsgrub theg pa'i dam pa spong byed pa //
T04TD3944E:235a-16: g-yo sgyu spyod min rgyu ni gzhan med do //
T04TD3944E:235a-17: bdud kyi 'khrug pas ma non su zhig ko / dkon mchog gsum gyi 'byung gnas theg pa ste //
T04TD3944E:235a-18: gnod pa'i mda' 'byin bde gshegs theg pa la //
T04TD3944E:235a-19: smod par su byed de ni 'gro ba'i sgra //
T04TD3944E:235a-20: shes rab mig zums [?] 'gros 'khyar gyur pa la //
T04TD3944E:235a-21: 'jig rten don sgrub rgyal ba'i rgyal rigs na //
T04TD3944E:235a-22: snying rje mi skyed skyes bu gang zhig yod //
T04TD3944E:235a-23: de dag rmongs bsal brtson 'grus su mi rtsom //
T04TD3944E:235a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o /
T04TD3944E:235a-26: // / pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa a'arya sh'u ras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04TD3944E:235a-28: // / lo ts'a ba a'a ts'a rya bee ro tsa na ra kshi tas bsgyur ba'o /
